chapter.title: INTRODUCTION
chapter.para: Diary of Elizabeth Anne Jennings, later Anne Jennings Krush. Known to me and her other grandchildren as "Nanny." Her eldest daughter, Carol Krush, inherited all of Nanny's journals. Aunt Carol sent the journals to me in February 2020.
This journal has an interesting set-up; one page for each day of the year, but with lines allowing entries for the same day on four different years.
Before reading, I highly recommend reviewing Nanny's list of abberviations at the end!

listitem.para: 1926 - Went to Mrs. Smiths. Friday
1927 - Saturday. Back here again. Earle came home with us at night. We were up at his house.
1928 - Sunday. Went to S. S. and Church. Lolled around. Went skating. In third year. Think of it !!!
1929 - Tuesday. Well!! Here goes year no. 4!!! I went up home in aft. We had a turkey for lunch. It was good.
1930 - Wednesday. Well! Last year for this date! (?) I love you now, dear diary! I'll miss you next year!! Went to Peggy's for supper.
1926 - Saturday. Went sled ridding.
1927 - Sunday. Played and sled rode with Earle. Went to S.S. Took Earle home in afternoon.
1928 - Monday. Went to Earles, then to Crutchy's party and skated tonight.
1929 - Wednesday. Brrr!! It's cold!! It's only 20 degrees. Played around. Wrote "Thank you" letters. Took Buddy for run.
1930 - Thursday. I gave a party of Michigan and Seven Up. Peggy T. and Sib Crampton each carried off a head and booby prize! How queer.
1926 - Went to Church. Earl and Mildred and their father came. Went skating and sled ridding. Sunday.
1927 - Monday. Franee came over in morning and afternoon. We sled rode skiied and did everything. We learned to go down Houstons back hill
1928 - Tuesday. Skated in the morning and afternoon with Franee
1929 - Thursday. Went to Duquesne Garden with F.E. and A.C. and Pinkney Gott. Aunt Hat chaperoned us. We had fun.
1930 - Friday. Robinson dance for Helen. Had a time. Was introduced to Saddy Peters. A cute boy but short. Basketball game I was beat 2 for 25 - 24. I was a (?)
1926 - Mon. Went to opticians. Went to Mrs. Smiths. Had drops in eyes.
1927 - Tuesday. Went to town. Did a lot of things.
1928 - Wednesday. Basketball. After that I went skating.
1929 - Friday. F.E., A.C, M.W.V.P. and I had lunch in Coamy. We collected signs. Went down to Case's in eve. Stayed til almost 1 o'clock.
1930 - Saturday. Went to Franny's party. got third score; so almost won the prize!
1926 - Tues. Went to school second term. grade 6. I had drops in eyes. Couldn't read or write
1927 - Wednesday. Went to school first day. Went to choir practice. Franee came over. We skiied.
1928 - Thursday. Went skating. Beginning to melt.
1929 - Saturday. Went to town. Shopped. Ate lunch at Reymer's Aunt Hat, John and I. Aunt Hat and I went to Penn. We saw "A Woman of Affairs."
1930 - Sunday. Oh dear! John left! I'm so lonely here and can't go out - absolutely forbidden while my heart is breaking.
1926 - Wed. Went to school. Had drops in eyes. Aunt Hat did my lessons.
1927 - Thursday. Alice Crutchfield came over. We went sled riding.
1928 - Friday. No iceskating. Rode around in the gig. It goes fine. P.T. and F.E and I went.
1929 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church and at night too. Fooled around. Stayed late at M.W.'s We had fun.
1930 - Monday. Aunt Hat, Dammuddy, Effie and I went to town. Saw R. Colman in "Condemned!". It was very sad. Shopped a lot.
1926 - Thurs. Went to school. Aunt Hat did my lessons. Saw and talked to Wi. H. on Chief. popped corn.
1927 - Friday. In afternoon went to town and got new coat and hat. Went to Earle's.
1928 - Went up to Earls. Have $89.46 in bank.
1929 - Monday. P.T is home. We got more signs for club. I went to P.T.'s for lunch. We had fire in Coamy.
1930 - Tuesday. School commenced. Form 4 - or grade 10. It certainly has changed since 4 years ago.
1926 - Fri. Went to optician. Had glasses perscription (sp). Went to Dunn, Scott, and Koerts Snowed hard. 6 in. deep.
1927 - Saturday. Went to Wm. Penn for lunch. Then to Alvin Theatre. Brownee had it.
1928 - Sunday. Went to church at night. Slept late. Thought I had "mumps."
1929 - Tuesday. Got sick (flu). You might no the very day school begins nmad ti
1930 - Wednesday. We're having good algebra now. Graphs, the only part I like! Played bridge at Mary Wells'.
1926 - Sat. Had S.S. rehersal. I had to say prayer and commandments. Went uptown and got glasses.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and church. Our class led today. Did very well. I was not in it. Hee hee.
1928 - Monday. Had basketball. Played 4 oiut of 5 games. She scolded me (Miss Long.)(for bad playing.)
1929 - Wednesday. Am better. I just feel lazy. I will get to school by Monday, I'm sure.
1930 - Thursday. No basketball, so Mary Wells and I played rook! Studied till 11:15 tonight. 5 lessons.
1926 - Sun. Went up to the pulpit, read prayer and commandments. Went sledding.
1927 - Mon. Played basketball. Other side won 26 - 24. Boo Hoo. Oh, well !!!
1928 - Tues. Came home and played around.
1929 - Thursday. Got up for a little while today. Am fine now.
1930 - Friday. No gym. Dicky has toothache Did lesson and then stayed up for Dammuddy's last night here!
1926 - Mon. Went to school. Went to Houstons. Went sledriding with Betty Wheat.
1927 - Tuesday. Went ice skating with Franee, Lulu Lip. and Margy.
1928 - Wednesday. Basketball.
1929 - Friday. Got sick at my stomach. Am better tonight. "Mumsie dear" brought me a plant.
1930 - Saturday. Dammuddy left! Boohoo. I miss her. Went to worner? at 9:15 saw Marilyn Miller in "Sally". Good.
1926 - Tues. Went to school and Dancing school.
1927 - Wednesday. Went skating. Very good day for it. Lost my ring and couldn't find it. Dawgommit!!!!
1928 - Thursday. Played at Franny's
1929 - Saturday. Got flowers from Peggy and a plant from Rody (the deer gurls.)
1930 - Sunday. Slept late. Bill is mean! He hasn't been over for a long time, diary. Boohoo!
1926 - Wed. Went sledridding with Billy. He learned to curve Houston's driveway alone. Went to school.
1927 - Thursday. Came home and read. Almost got sick. Found ring hooray!!!
1928 - Friday. Basketball.
1929 - Read funnies. Fooled aroiund in bed.
1930 - Monday. Got excellent in music. Oh do!
1926 - Thurs. Went ice skating with Frances Emery. Brought Hester Lyon home.
1927 - Friday. Stayed home and read. Mother went away.
Saturday. Went to Betty Wheats Bridge Luncheon. Brought home the bacon.
1929 - Monday. Stayed in bed. Did lessons, wrote letters to kids.
1930 - Tuesday. Had my hair curled etc. Had new curls put in.
1926 - Fri. Went skating at Edgeworth Club with Louise and Nancy Lippincott and Billy McPherson.
1927 - Saturday. Worked around and read.
1928 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and church.
1929 - Tues. Sat up. My ear is better. I had it syringed.
1930 - Wednesday. Je ne sais nas qui m'est venu etc. Je ne sais nar comment on ecnit cela!!!
1926 - Sat. Went to Aunt Hat's Mother Mrs. Smiths.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church. Went up to Earle's.
1928 - Monday. Went to varisty practice.
1929 - Wednesday. Got up for lunch. I ate supper downstairs also.
1930 - Thursday. M.W. and I went up ? We blew ourselves.
1926 - Sun. Went to Mrs. Smiths. Bumped into by automobile in town. Had quarrel with 16 year old girl.
1927 - Monday. Played basketball. Had a good time.
1928 - Tuesday. Came home.
1929 - Thursday. Stayed up all day today. Am going to school tomorrow.
1930 - Meeting at M.W's We then went to her music lesson. She got excellent.
1926 - Mon. Betty Wheat came over. Went to Billies
1927 - Came home and read. It snowed but afterwards it rained.
1928 - Wednesday. Vassar beat Bryn Mawr 28 - 21.
1929 - Friday. Went to school. Came home and "rested."
1930 - Saturday. Went to town with Mary Wells. Saw "Sunny Side Up". a darn good picture.
1926 - Tues. Went to dancing school. Went to Mrs. Smiths. Earl was in play. In all a club.
1927 - Wednesday. Went to choir practice.
1928 - Thursday. Came home and rested.
1929 - Saturday. Went to Pinkney Gott's party. I had won lufly tyme.
1930 - Sunday. Went to U.P. Church with Effie and her ma and Aunt Hat.
1926 - Wed. Had first music lesson. Miss Clarke. Had a lot of fun. Jimmy Jones sent out of room in school.
1927 - Thursday. Went and played basketball. Had a good time.
1928 - Friday. Went to basketball.
1929 - Sunday. Took an illustrious walk. Ended up at Crutchy's Went to church tonite.
1930 - Monday. Only got Very good in music. I'm mad at her.
1926 - Thurs. Went to Edgeworth Club and bowled. Got heck for it. Rained and then big snowstorm About 3 inches. Still snowing tonight.
1927 - Friday. Went to Charlotte Davis' made some paper dolls.
1928 - Saturday. Went to Anne Fergusons Bridge Luncheon. Won 1st prize = – Pillow.
1929 - Monday. Our team lost 15-11 BooHoo!!! Our name is "Red T's" Rah! for the Red T's !!!!!
1930 - Tuesday. Basketball! Lots of fun. Played in a game. Our side won. B. Wheat and I played frds(?)
1926 - Fri. Went sled-riding with Mary Wells Van Pelt. Billy came over. He said his mother would bring him these many presents - two
1927 - Saturday. Mary Wells came over. We played cards and games.
1928 - Sunday. Went to S. Sand Church. Went iceskating.
1929 - Tuesday. Had picture taken (Hockey) was late to music lesson.
1930 - Wednesday. Came home. Washed hair etc. Went skating with Effie at night & B Dunsford too.
1926 - Sat. Went sled-riding with Bill Richardson. Baked cookies. Aunt Hat helped, rather did it all. Snow still pretty deep.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. Went to Earle's.
1928 - Monday. Played basketball.
1929 - Wednesday. Played with Peggy.
1930 - Thursday. Basketball! I played center and like it very much. We beat Wadsi.? in = two in one out!
1926 - Sun. Went to Sunday School. Betty Wheat came over and we sledrode. We went to Episcopal Church.
1927 - Monday. Went to basketball. Am on Vassar team. Hurrah! So is Franee!!
1928 - Cleaned cellar cats … (you know the rest.)
1929 - Thursday. Washed my hair. Took bike up to be fixed.
1930 - Friday. Skating at night. Dinner at Effie's. Betty Dunsfort had a friend Martha Pratz. Very cute.
1926 - Mon. Went sledriding. Had hair washed. Black as Jack's scrubwater. felt much better afterwards.
1927 - Tuesday. Played with Charlotte Davis at her house.
1928 - Wednesday. Played basketball, Smith beat us (Mr. Holyoke) 17 - 12 Boo hoo.
1929 - Friday. Went to P.T.'s Party. Had loads of fun.
1930 - Saturday. Got up late. Went to town to Mrs. Smith's.
1926 - Tues. Went to Dancing School, and school. Dr. Haskell gave us an examination.
1927 - Wednesday. Charlotte came over here. We cut out more paper dolls.
1928 - Thursday. I went iceskating.
1929 - Saturday. Went and had picture taken. Went to "Cass" Boyd's party. Had fun.
1930 - Sunday. Union meeting at M.E. Church. M. Ott took us skiing in aft. Seven of us went. Peachy!
1926 - Wed. Had music lesson, got new book. Went to school and heard lecture C Wallace Petty. About the Royal Piglet, and the lady leaving six barrels of pins.
1927 - Thursday. Vassar beat Bryn Mawr - 24 - 8. I made 4 baskets. See paper for lineup. Hooray for Vassar!!!
1928 - Friday. Basketball.
1929 - Went to Sunday School, Church. In aft., G.E. ? and I went to P.T.'s and made the "Red Team Banner." Went to church.
1930 - Monday. Whew! What a close call! I got to school at 8:29. You see, I was sick!! I upchucked also got V.G. in music.
1926 - Thurs. Went to village with Aunt Hat and Billy. Had soda, got out of school at 9:15. School too cold.
1927 - Friday. Came home early. Went to Margy's for dinner. Came home and went to Mrs. Emericks.
1928 - Saturday. Went up to Earles.
1929 - Monday. I played today for the 1st time. We won!! Hooray Red T's We beat team, 19 - 15.
1930 - Tuesday. Basketball as usual. The sno is melting dagnabit.
1926 - Fri. Went to Billies. Made nutbread and cakes. Had a lot of fun.
1927 - Saturday. Went to Earles. Had a good time.
1928 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and church in a.m., aft. and p.m. Went iceskating.
1929 - Tuesday. Had music lesson. Got my bike. Went to Mary Wells'.
1930 - Wednesday. Played Michigan. Studies hard for a week from today! Exams.
1926 - Sat. Went to Mrs. Smiths.
1927 - Sunday. Didn't go to S.S. Got up real late. I had cold.
1928 - Monday. Played basketball.
1929 - Wednesday. Watched a game of basketball. N. Lippincotts team beat "Lib" Craig's.
1930 - Thursday. Varsity practice. I'm out for center now! Bill came to school. He is darling.
1926 - Sun. Made popcorn balls.
1927 - Monday. Watched girls practice B.B. Midyears Had Eng. exam. My mark was a.
1928 - Tuesday. Went iceskating.
1929 - Went to Sewickley Theatre. Heard a man's lecture on South Americat.
1930 - Friday. Yea!! Red T's beat G. Marks 14-13! Whew. Pajama party. YOMCA! Had loads of fun. All slept in (?)'s room.
1926 - Tuesday. Went to Dancing School. Led First Cotillion with David Miller.
1927 - Tuesday. Had History and Arithmetic exams. Got A in both.
1926 - I had hair washed. Planned Valentine's party.
1927 - Wednesday. Had French and Latin exam. Had A in both. They are over. Hurrah!
1928 - Wednesday. Took Latin and French exams. Got A+ and A-.
1929 - Friday. Went iceskating. Pinkney Gott, Peggy, Alice C. We had fun.
1930 - Saturday. We didn't get up til about 12:00. Did lessons in aft. Went out in evening.
1926 - Went to Dancing School. Led my first cotillion with David Miller. Tuesday.
1927 - Thursday. Washed Buddy. Wellesley beat Smith 24 - 8.
1928 - Thursday. Took Hist and Eng. exams. Got B+ in both.
1929 - Saturday. Went to town with Mum!! I got a new coat and hat. Went to Earl's.
1930 - Sunday. Stayed home and practiced. Boohoo! Went to Townsends for dinner. Church later.
1926 - Wednesday. Took music lesson. Went over to Lou's in evening, Betty Wheat came over. Both had music lessons.
1927 - Friday. Didn't go to school. Played around.
1928 - Friday. Took math. exam. Got e+? even!! Goody!!
1929 - Sunday. Went to all. Wore my new camels hair coat. Ooh!! I love it!! It's so pretty, comfy and warm!!!
1930 - Monday. Well! Well! Well! I got an excellent for a change!!
1926 - Thursday. We'd had surprize party. Went sledriding. Mrs. Fonner hurt her ankle.
1927 - Meant to be Memoranda. Tues.
1928 - Saturday. Took girls to Duquesne Gardens. 15. Had lots of fun.
1929 - Monday. Had algebra exam Ugh!! How foul!!! Went to Peggy's for lunch. Got C.
1930 - Tuesday. Came home and fooled around. There was basketball but I didn't go. Had hair washed.
1926 - Friday. Went sledriding. Mrs. Fonner didn't come to school.
1927 - Saturday. Went to Earles. Had a goodtime. Very warm out.
1928 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church. Aunt Hat went to N.J. Boo Hoo.
1929 - Tuesday. Got A. Had Latin exam. Got excellent in music lesson. Miss Moore gave me apiece. She's nice.
1930 - Wednesday. Brrr!! Exams started. Had English (B+) and French (B). Eng. terrible but other quite easy!!
1926 - Saturday. Went sledriding with Frances Emery. Had party Sixteen girls. List is here.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and to Church at night. Went for walk, A.H M.E
1928 - Monday. Bryn Mawr beat Radcliff. Hooray for Franny!!
1929 - Wednesday. Had French and Eng. exams. Got A and B+.
1930 - Thursday. Latin(C+) and History (B+) exams! Both were quite all right. I hope I passed.
1926 - Sunday. Went to Sunday School. Betty Wheat and I went sledriding.
1927 - Monday. Practiced basketball. Had a tres good time.
1928 - Wednesday. Went swimming with Rody, Betty W. and Franny.
1929 - Thursday. Rejoice!! Exams are over. I fooled around today!!!!!!
1930 - Friday. Math ( C) exam! Ugh. It wasn't so terribly bad I think I passed anyway. Hooray! All over.
1926 - Monday. Went to school. Mrs. Fonner still gone. Stubby has been gone 2 days and we hunted him.
1927 - Tuesday. Got new dog. Named him Sandy. He is something like Buddy.
1928 - Wednesday. Hooray!! Mr. Holyoke beat Vassar 31 - 19. Yay - Yay - Yay!!!!
1929 - Friday. Watched a basketball game. Team 1 tied team 2 20-20. Very thrilling!!!!
1930 - Saturday. Mr. Townsend took us to see "As You Like It." Boy! It was grand.
1926 - Tuesday. Went to dancing school. Stubby still gone. Mrs. Fonner still gone.
1927 - Wednesday. Came home and played with Sandy.
1928 - Thursday. Played with Peggy T and Franny Emery.
1929 - Saturday. School Dance! Oh what fun!! I mushed around this whole live long day!
1930 - Sunday. M.W. came over. We wrote letters, etc. W. also came over. Um Um!!
1926 - Wednesday. Went to village. Mrs. Fonner is back. Stubby is still gone. Hope to soon find him.
1927 - Thursday. Vassar (us) beat Smith!!!! 18 - 14. I made about 6 baskets!
1928 - Friday. Went to Peggy Townsends for supper. Had a good time. Played ghosts.
1929 - Sunday. P.T. took us skating at the Country Club. We walked back. Louise Lippincot, F.E., P.T. and I.
1930 - Monday. Got excellent in music. Didn't have all alg. conf?!! Got marks Brrr!
1926 - Thursday. Had music lesson. Aunt Hat went to town. Stubby still gone.
1927 - Friday. Stayed at home. Washed Buddy at night.
1928 - Saturday. Mrs. Wray came all night. I went to Chiropodist. I have warts on my left foot, very bad.
1929 - Got valentines. Went to P.T.'s and fooled around. Team 4 beat team 5, 32 - 6, I think.
1930 - Tuesday. Basketball practice. Had lots of fun!
1926 - Friday. Found train had run over Stubby. Got his collar. Poor Boy. We all are crying. Went to M.J. White's party.
1927 - Saturday. Went to Earles. Had a good time.
1928 - Sunday. Was sick. Went to Lyons. Had valentine party. Went to bed with Hester.
1929 - Tuesday. Got Excellent. We are having radicals in Algebra. Furnace is bum and I am frigid.
1930 - Wednesday. Lincy's birthday. Went to see "The Vagabond King" good.
1926 - Saturday. Had hair cut, got ribbon, etc. Went to Earl's. Bill stayed all night.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church. Stayed at home all day. Went to Church at night.
1928 - Monday. Played basketball.
1929 - Wednesday. We had Varsity practice.
1930 - Thursday. B.B. practice. Also Purple Pirates beat Pepe in game! Ray Crutchy!
1926 - Sunday. Was only one in S.S. class. Bun came for supper.
1927 - Monday. Went and played basketball. Had fun.
1928 - Tuesday. Got 19? valentines, Girls Civics Club (us) distributed them.
1929 - Thursday. We had lots of fun with valentines. I got about 19 or 20.
1930 - Friday. Valentine's Day. Got 16. We beat boys in game 13-8. I made 10 points. I nearly fainted little diary
1926 - Monday. Betty Wheat came over. We went to Billy's. Played rum with A.Id. She won. 7 - 14
1927 - Tuesday. Franee came over after basketball. We played jacks.
1928 - Wednesday. Played basketball.
1929 - Friday. Watched a basketball game!!
1930 - Saturday. Mrs Harbison took us to hear Yehudi Menuhin! 13 years old! great! Went to Milton's birthday party!
1926 - Tuesday. Went to dancing school. Played cards. Had fun with boys.
1927 - Wednesday. Came home and read. (For a change.)
1928 - Thursday. Played with Franee at her house.
1929 - Saturday. Peggy T. took Aunt Hat and me to 2 movies. I treated them to lunch.
1930 - Sunday. Bill was over. Did English. Wicked! Wicked!
1926 - Wednesday. Had music lesson. Went to church. Ash Wednesday. Went to Margaret Millers for lunch.
1927 - Thursday. No school!!! Hooray!!!! Martin Moore has a light case of Scarlet Fever. School is fumigation. (sp.)
1928 - Friday. Hooray. Aunt Hat came home!!! At last my clothes will be mended.
1929 - Sunday. Played around. Did what I usually do.
1930 - Monday. Only got "Fair" in music because I sprained my wrist last week and couldn't play. I don't think it is a fair mark.
1926 - Thursday. Went sledriding with Franee Emery. I got soaked to my skin.
1927 - Friday. F.E. and I went to Mary Wells for lunch and stayed. We had a good time.
1928 - Saturday. Went skating at Duquesne Gardens. Dutch treat. Mrs. Wheat chaperoned us.
1929 - Monday. Watched a basketball game. Purple Pirates beat Peps 9-8.
1930 - Tuesday. Played basketball. Not much fun because B. Dunsford stepped all over me!
1926 - Friday. Snowed again. Went sledriding with Alice Crutchfield.
1927 - Saturday. Snowed all day long. Very deep. Worked and played. Went to F.E.'s for lunch.
1928 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church. Played around in afternoon.
1929 - Tuesday. Took music lesson, etc.
1930 - Wednesday. Franny and I wrote the message for Mr. Sink on Friday.
1926 - Saturday. John got tonsillitis. Went sledriding all day.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. Made tunnel at Tallman's. Snow is over a foot deep.
1928 - Monday. Smith beat Radcliff. Darnit. We wanted Radcliff to win.
1929 - Wednesday. Went skiing at Country Club. It was dandy.
1930 - Thursday. Came home and rested. I'm all worn out from studying so late.
1926 - Sunday. Went sledriding. Went to Sunday School. John still sick.
1927 - Monday. Went skiing in afternoon with Betty and Franee.
1928 - Tuesday. Had YOMCA meeting. I was elected Pres. Peggy Townshend our new member.
1929 - Thursday. Went skiing at the Country Club instead of a meeting –- club YOMCA
1930 - Friday. Had party for Mr. Sink. Sarah Jane was mad at me. Teehee. We had a good time anyway.
1926 - Monday. Went to Earls. Missed train, Skidded terribly in car. Got black eye. Saw Milton Sprole Stewart.
1927 - Tuesday. Went to Earl's. Had a good time.
1928 - Wednesday. Went up home. Gave her (Mrs. Smith's birthday) chocolate cherries.
1929 - Friday. Hooray!! Red T's won!! 26-7. Yea! for our side!!!!!
1930 - Saturday. Went to town after I did my lessons. Mrs. Smith's Birthday, gave her a plant.
1926 - Tuesday. Went to dancing school. John is a little better.
1927 - Wednesday. Practiced basketball.
1928 - Thursday. Played basketball with Anne Ferguson, Sissy McCabe and Franny.
1929 - Saturday. Slept late. Played with kids. Went skiing at the Montown(?) Club.
1930 - Sunday. Bill and Wally came over. Um um! Went to all. Mr. Reid was peachy tonight.
1926 - Wednesday. Had music lesson. John's temp. 99.2. Went sledriding.
1927 - Thursday. Wellesley beat Bryn Mawr 50 - 20. Higgins made 23 baskets.
1928 - Friday. Played with Peggy T. We made candy.
1929 - Sunday. Did the usual things. Had fun.
1930 - Monday. Got excellent in music. I guess she's sorry about la semaine derniere.
1926 - Thursday. Went to Miss Clarke's for a S.S. meeting. Bert came over. Cleaned sidewalk. Mrs. Kisners birthday.
1927 - Friday. Franee came over. We washed Buddy and Sandy in afternoon.
1928 - Saturday. Went up home. Also went to Miss Gussie's My warts are almost gone.
1929 - Monday. No game. Fooled around at Van Pelts.
1930 - Tuesday Played b.b. I got all tired out. I was naughty, I guess, because I already had a cold.
1926 - Friday. Went to school.
1927 - Saturday. Franee and Hippy came for lunch. We played cards and everything.
1928 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church and Church at night. Played around.
1929 - Tuesday. Got excellent in music. (as usual - like nit?) Worked around. Went to church.
1930 - Wednesday. Coamy here. I got out on Honor Roll. Not so much fun.
1926 - Aunt Hat got sick. Worked around the house.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church. Went skiing in afternoon
1928 - Monday. RahRahRah!! Mt. Holyoke beat Bryn Mawr 34-29. It was very close Yay for our team!!
1929 - Wednesday Fooled around at Peggy's.
1930 - Thursday. Didn't play b.b. as I'm all worn out.
1926 - Sunday. Went to Sunday School Aunt Hat got up.
1927 - Monday. Practiced basketball. Big game tomorrow. I am going to substitute.
1928 - Tuesday. Glee Club practice. Went to Peggy T's. We worked.
1929 - Thursday. Saw "The Merchant of Venice" It was peachy.
1930 - Game between teams. Plaid Pups beat Question Marks.
1926 - Monday. Alice Crutchfield came over. Aunt Hat back to bed. Gall stones (note, should be 3/1/26)
1927 - Tuesday. We won! 22 - 18! Hooray!!! I just got to play 2 minutes. I was punky? (note, should be 3/1/26)
1928 - Wednesday. Hooray!!! Leap year. The only one that will occur in this book. Hooray.

caption.para: People Who Came to My Party

listitem.para: 1926 - Meant to be Monday (note: entry on FEBRUARY 29 page.)
1927 - Meant to be Tuesday. Hooray for our team !!!!! (note: entry on FEBRUARY 29 page.)
1928 - Thursday. Fooled around with the girls
1929 - Friday. Sewed. Got a souvenir from the Tallmans, on Miss Insecort's trunk.
1930 - Saturday. Stayed home all day as Aunt Hat wasn't so hot. nor was I.
1926 - Tuesday. Went to dancing school. Aunt Hat still sick.
1927 - Wednesday. Came home and rested and read.
1928 - Friday. Basketball practice.
1929 - Saturday. Went to Penn, Shopped and went up to Mt. Washington.
1930 - Sunday. Didn't go to S.S. Slept late. Went at night. Bill was over for a while.
1926 - Wednesday. Took Music Lesson.
1927 - Thursday. Whew!! We actually tied Wellesley with a 24-24 score. It sure as some game.
1928 - Saturday. Latin play practice. I went uptown with Peggy Townsend and Phyllis.
1929 - Sunday. Did as usual. Went to M.W.'s in aft. I met Billy Mallard. I like him. He is very cute!!!
1930 - Monday. Got excellent in music. Didn't do much else.
1926 - Thursday. Aunt Hat still sick. Rehearsed for play.
1927 - Friday. No school in afternoon!! Stayed home and worked and played.
1928 - Sunday. Played at Peggy's. We fooled around
1929 - Monday. Whew!! Ye Red T's actually beat Purple Pirates 20 - 19. What a close shave. Yea! We're ahead!!
1930 - Tuesday. Practice. I am just about better now from my sore throat and cold.
1926 - Friday. Had play. Aunt Hat better.
1927 - Saturday. Went to town and to Earles. Saw Titania's Palace. It was very good.
1928 - Monday. Varsity Squad Practice.
1929 - Tuesday. It snowed and is all slushy. Got excellent at music. Played at Pam's.
1930 - Wednesday. Boys played Shadyside. Won 12 - 9. Little boys lost.
1926 - Saturday. Worked most all time.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. at night they thought I had measles. Mary Wells came over.
1928 - Tuesday. Latin Play Practice. Glee Club Practice.
1929 - Wednesday. Varsity practice. Shooie kept us in for throwing paper around. I am a little angel. I'm writing this on Wed.
1930 - Thursday. Howdy! Varsity practice. All ready for game tomorrow. Miss Graff married Mr. Wright. Tiger got kittens. 2.
1926 - Sunday. Aunt Hat sitting up. Got Books of Bible.
1927 - Monday. Came and read with Mary Wells. We couldn't get in.
1928 - Wednesday. We played Miss Ellis's. Beat them 30-19. I didn't get to play. Just Lu and I. next day ->
1929 - Thursday. Went to see "Julius Caesar" tonite. It was pretty good. Not as good as M. of V. though.
1930 - Friday. Game with Ellis!! We won 47-14. I played on half. Center and forward.
1926 - Monday. Aunt Hat still sick.
1927 - Tuesday. Our team played Miss Ellis'. The other team won 29-14.
1928 - Thursday. ← Day before. Latin Play & practice. We fooled around.
1929 - Friday. Varsity practice.
1930 - Saturday. Went to town. Saw Greta Garbo in "Anna Christie" Awful.
1926 - Tuesday. Went to Dancing School. Aunt Hat beginning to recover.
1927 - Wednesday. Frances came over.
1928 - Friday. Played basketball. Latin Play practice.
1929 - Saturday. Went to Earl's. Bought stuff.
1930 - Sunday. Went to S.S. & church. Stayed home at night.
1926 - Wednesday. Music lesson postponed. Franee Emery played with me.
1927 - Thursday. Played Basketball. Miss Long wasn't there, so it was a fizzle.
1928 - Saturday. Went to chiropodist. Warts almost gone. Went up to Earles.
1929 - Sunday. Took Mum's pittence. Peggy and I went for a walk!!!
1930 - Monday. Got "excellent". Have Nevin's Love Song now ? it later.
1926 - Thursday. Aunt Hat on the road to getting well. Great joy in our house. At lease me anyway.
1927 - Friday. I got the 3 Day measles! Dawgomit. I am mad.
1928 - Sunday. Took a walk with Peggy Townsend and Winnie Matthews. We got KITTENS!!! B. 1gray, 1 black & white
1929 - Monday. Dear me! Peps beat us. BooHoo! Our first game lost. Ma was "Lane" (a butler) in "The Importance of Being Earnest." ? on couch, hair just washed, radio going and awful desert.
1930 - Her I am! I had an awful time opening you, diary. Basketball practice today.
1926 - Friday. Aunt Hat went to Oakmont. Her Sister-in-Law is very sick. Poor Girl. Took music lesson.
1927 - Saturday. Had to stay in bed. Temp. is normal. Played games all day.
1928 - Monday. Mother was George Connaught in the Sen. play "Evening Dress Indispensable." Got another KITTEN. gray.
1929 - Tuesday. At my moosic lesson I only got "Very Good", Boo Hoo! That spoils my record.
1930 - Came home and washed hair.
1926 - Saturday. Had hair washed. Read all day. Aunt Hat's sister-in-law died - Ada. Great sadness.
1927 - Sunday. Stayed in bed. Read Funnies. Played games.
1928 - Tuesday. Singing and Latin practice. Tea at the Gotts.
1929 - Wednesday. In Public Speaking we were Irish. I had to recite a lot of poetry.
1930 - Thursday. Basketball. Mr. Sink got mad at me because I answered a note. I've sworn off writing them for the rest of Lent.
1926 - Sunday. Went to Sunday School. Read all day.
1927 - Monday. Stayed in bed. Had an enema. I feel fine.
1928 - Wednesday. Hooray!!! Bryn Mawr beat Smith Rah!Rah!!Rah!!!
1929 - Thursday. Y.O.M.C.A. Crutchy was elected president. I am ex-president now. Peggy is Sec. Treas. M.W. is ex Sec. Treas.
1930 - Friday. Boys had game with Arnold. The little boys, they lost, but I don't know the score
1926 - Monday. Alice Brown, Crutchfield, Franee Emery, Betty Wheat came over. Played hopscotch.
1927 - Tuesday. Hooray!!! I got up! It is better than in bed.
1928 - Thursday. Latin Play Practice, also singing.
1929 - Friday. Varsity practice. We had fun. I played Center.
1930 - Saturday. Went to town after having 2 teeth filled. Pit cavities.
1926 - Tuesday. No dancing school. Betty Wheat, Alice Crutchfield, M.W. V.P, James Yost, David Miller came over. Played Cops and thieves.
1927 - Wednesday. Am allowed downstairs. Worked and played.
1928 - Friday. Dress Rehearsal of all plays. I am sick. Am in bed now.
1929 - Saturday. Saw Dracula!!! Gee!! It's spookie! F.E., A.H., M.W., V.P., P.T. and I. Tiger had 4 kittens, Patrick, Pt, Patty and Patricia.
1930 - Sunday. Slept late & finally went to church at night. Fooled around all day. Mrs. Graff here.
1926 - Wednesday. Had a music lesson
1927 - Thursday. Called up kids. Played and did everything but read.
1928 - Saturday. Am sick, but partook in Latin Play but not in singing. John was in English Play!
1929 - Sunday. Went to the class in church that D.O'Dell preaches. I'm going to join church.
1930 - Monday. Got excellent in music. Last lesson for two weeks.
1926 - Thursday. Betty Wheat, James Yost, David, Miller, Oliver Campbell came over. Went for a ride.
1927 - Friday. Called up kids. Played baseball with Tallman's.
1928 - Sunday. In bed all day. I have a cough, sore throat and a head cold.
1929 - Monday. I am one of the editors of our class paper. Franny is one too. In aft. I popped corn.
1930 - Tuesday. Yeh!! We beat Simonson 45 - 15!! I played a half but wasn't so hot. Mr. Sink bawled me out again today for talking or something.
1926 - Friday. Went to town. Got tooth pulled. Have a cavity.
1927 - Saturday. Played around. Played outside.
1928 - Monday. I'm better today, but my temp. isn't normal.
1929 - Tuesday. Had moosic lesson. Got excellent. Got bike.
1930 - Wednesday. Came home and had hair washed.
1926 - Saturday. Went to Charlotte Davis'. Had a hair wash.
1927 - Sunday. Hooray. I am out of quarantine. Read and play.
1928 - Tuesday. My temp is normal today. I get up Thurs.
1929 - Wednesday. Fooled around with Katy. Had d--n hair washed. Had exalted Charlotte Rouse. I belched it all nite.
1930 - Thursday. Varsity. Heck! I'm so mad! I couldn't do a thing! Dick also bawled poor Ruth out.
1926 - Sunday. Betty Wheat came over. Went to Sunday School. Had a haircut.
1927 - Monday. Franee came over. Mary Wells had 4 teeth taken out.
1928 - Wednesday. Heck! My temp isn't normal. I get up Fri.
1929 - Thursday. Played hard over Katrina. Nous avons eu fun. (Please note the French).
1930 - Friday. We beat Ellis 45-16! I played in every quarter (but not all though) for 1st time, but wasn't so hot. Played center & forward.
1926 - Monday. Went to a Lenten Tea given by Betty Wheat's class. Jack left us. 22 = 2-1 = 1+2 = 3 1+3 = 13
1927 - Tuesday. Alice C. Franee E., Mary Wells and myself had meeting of Y.O.M.C.A.
1928 - Thursday. My temp is normal today. Hooray!!!
1929 - Friday. Stayed home. Played with Pat etc. School let out at noon.
1930 - Saturday. John came home!!!!! Hooray!! He's just fine & grand. He was late getting here. He's so tall!
1926 - Tuesday. Started house cleaning. Phew, diary, I'm all in.
1927 - Wednesday. Went to town to Earles.
1928 - Friday. Kittens opened eyes. I just got to sit up today. It is a beeg gyp.
1929 - Saturday. Went to oculist, and up to Earl's.
1930 - Sunday. Bill was here for lunch. John's first whole day here. He's so nice & yummy!
1926 - Wednesday. Scrubbed kitchen and porch. Got .40 Had music lesson. Had tooth filled. Jane and Winnie came over.
1927 - Thursday. Went to Church. Went with Hippy.
1928 - Saturday. I got up. Walked around.
1929 - Sunday. Franny came over in aft. Went to Church, and heard, at night, the Passion Play. It was good. M.W. was in it.
1930 - Monday. Went with M.W. while she had her teeth fixed.
1926 - Thursday. Made stilts. They are all right except they are always coming apart.
1927 - Friday. Went to Hippy's for lunch.
1928 - Sunday. Went downstairs. It's about time.
1929 - Monday. Went to town. Got new glasses. We started to paint the clubhouse.
1930 - Tuesday. Mothers beat us 22-19. I played about 5 minutes. Was punk but I didn't even have a chance to get used to it.
1926 - Friday. Made my stilts. Spring vacation will be over on Tuesday.
1927 - Saturday. Franee came over.
1928 - Monday. Played around.
1929 - Tuesday. Helped paint the clubhouse. Got excellent in music.
1930 - Wednesday. School's out at last! Our small boys lost to Arnold 9-8. The big ones won 18-0!!!
1926 - Saturday. Scrubbed kitchen. Got $.35 for doing it. Made stilts better.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church. Mary Wells came for supper.
1928 - Tuesday. unknown.
1929 - Wednesday. Varnished clubhouse, after giving the walls a second coat. We started Peggy's playhouse.
1930 - Thursday. Went to Cotillion with Effie and Pinx Cute dances, etc.
1926 - Sunday. E. Church had pageant. Went to Sunday School. It had charge of vespers in afternoon.
1927 - Monday. Went up home. Had a lot of fun.
1928 - Wednesday. Played basketball.
1929 - Thursday. Finished Peggy's playhouse. We fooled around. I got a puncture in bike.
1930 - Friday. Went with Pinx. Helped make pajamas. Party at Pinx at night.
1926 - Monday. Went to town. Got 18 chickens.
1927 - Tuesday. Went to church at night. First day at school
1928 - Thursday. Went to oculist. Dum things.
1929 - Friday. Went to service at St. Stephen's. Went to city with M.W. and her Pa. He took us to dinner, then to Trinity.
1930 - Saturday. Went to Mrs. Harbusons. Worked. Had hair washed & waved in afternoon.
1926 - Tuesday. Started school. Went to dancing school.
1927 - Wednesday. Went to Emericks at night. Played with Franee in afternoon.
1928 - Friday. Unknown. probably went to town. I'm writing this on April 18.
1929 - Saturday. Varnished clubhouse. I rode on a workhorse. F.E. and M.W. came.
1930 - Sunday. Betty Boynton & Ma were here for dinner.! Boo hoo! John left for Andover. He was only here 8 days.
1926 - Wednesday. Had Music lesson.
1927 - Thursday. Mother was Melersh Wilkins. She was good. Mary W. came for supper.
1928 - Saturday. Went to town.
1929 - Sunday. Went to church class. Played in aft. Ma went to church - Easter. I got 1 lb ? ? Earls
1930 - ?. Went to town. Shopped a lot and saw "The Rogue Song" It was gah gah!! I loved it. Went to oculist.
1926 - Thursday. Fooled teachers. Went to Miss Clarkes.
1927 - Friday. Fooled all the teachers. Went down to Emericks.
1928 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and church. Palm Sunday.
1929 - Monday. Pups beat Purple Pirates!! Now they can't play us!!!
1930 - Monday. Had game with Alumnae. They beat us 24 - 17. We just couldn't pass right.
1926 - Friday. Went to Church 2 - 3.
1927 - Saturday. Got up early and went up to Earl's new home.
1928 - Monday. Played around. yuck. This diary's an awful bother.
1929 - Tuesday. Hadn't music lesson. Miss Moore is sick. I sent her flowers M.W. and I fooled around.
1930 - Wednesday. Fooled around in day. Went to Case's at night. Lots of fun & excitement getting home.
1926 - Saturday. Went to Margaret Miller's. Won prize for dressing and for dressing the fastest.
1927 - Mary Wells came over. Later we went to Church. We got (5) Baby Kittens!!!!
1928 - Tuesday. Darned if I know what happened. You can sl? me.
1929 - Wednesday. Game between Pups and ? Marks. Pups won!
1930 - Thursday. Went to a party but I've forgotten where!
1926 - Sunday. Went to Earls. Got 1 lb. Easter egg.
1927 - Monday. Went down to Franee's. Had a good time.
1928 - Wednesday. Oh heck –– blank space.
1929 - Thursday. Went to Effie's. Read old talking books. We brought couch and chair to Coamy.
1930 - Friday. Went to Mrs. Smiths. played Bingo. Had lots of fun.
1926 - Monday. Miss Massey gone. She's sick
1927 - Tuesday. Franee came over. Had a bright idea and worked it out.
1928 - Thursday. Ditto as to Wed.
1929 - Friday. Got 79 in Latin. We held Coamy! It was fun. I had refreshments.
1930 - Saturday. Peggy home!!! Yea! She took us to lunch & to "Honey." We took her to "The Sky Hawk". Had party for her at night. Ruth, Charlotte, Franny, Peggy & I went.
1926 - Tuesday. Went to Dancing School. We are still housecleaning.
1927 - Wednesday. Our plan failed but we going to do something else.
1928 - Friday. Went to oculist. Had drops for 2 hours.
1929 - Saturday. Went to see Macbeth. It was fine etc.
1930 - Sunday. Went to Peggie's for dinner. Boo! Hoo! She left tonight & I won’t see her till Thanksgiving or Xmas!
1926 - Wednesday. Franee Emery came over.
1927 - Thursday. Played with Mary Wells (Pen fox Short)
1928 - Saturday. Went to Earls. Got glasses.
1929 - Sunday. Mary Wells came. We studied etc. Lib Craig and Cam came over. We had fun. Took my first communion.
1930 - Monday. Went to town. Saw "The Benson Murder Case", G.H, Effie & I. Didn't care for it.
1926 - Thursday. Went to Music Lesson.
1927 - Friday. B? We sang in Glee Club. Part of Program (alto) I was ?
1928 - Sunday. Easter. Got lb and ½ egg
1929 - Monday. Yeah - eighteen! The Red T's have won everything!! We beat Peps 14 - 12! Oh! Boy !!!!
1930 - Tuesday. Red Ts beat Purple Pirates 24-12. School began! Ugh. Shooie had us for con. You might know!
1926 - Friday. Miss Molly gave Masquerade. I was a dutch girl.
1927 - Saturday. Went up home. Had fun all day.
1928 - Monday. We started housecleaning.
1929 - Tuesday. Game with Cory! They won 18 - 14 I played 1st half. We were ahead when I quit
1930 - Wednesday. Came home at 12:15. Miss Munson died. Sad! Flag at half mast. We had Coamy & I washed my hair.
1926 - Saturday. Went to Franee Emerys. Played baseball with the two McCabes and Mary Wells Van Pelt.
1927 - Went to S.S. and Church at night. Pan was in pageant. She was good.
1928 - Tuesday. Had meeting at Mary Wells's. We played baseball.
1929 - Wednesday. Went to town. Got hats, etc. Hooray! I'll be away soon.
1930 - Thursday. "Us's" tied gaps & Orioles 2-2. The Gaps? beat the Orioles 0-2. They had more people thought 2 - 7.
1926 - Sunday. Went to Sunday School.
1927 - Monday. Went swimming. Started Housecleaning.
1928 - Wednesday. Played around.
1929 - Thursday. Fooled around. Had hair curled. Hooray! We leave tomorrow. Went to high school play tonite.
1930 - Friday. Did lesson & went down to Franee's at night. I ropped chip & had terrible fate?
1926 - Monday. Went to Franny Emery's. Played baseball. Miss Massey back.
1927 - Tuesday. Played with Franee and T. Lipping here.
1928 - Thursday. Played baseball.
1929 - Friday. Left for Washington. Had a grand time on train.
1930 - Mrs. Harbisons & then Franny, Mary Ott & I played tennis & fooled around here. Mother in play "Out on the Streets." She was a dirty villain again. It was a dress rehearsal; so we all went.
1926 - Tuesday. Had game of baseball here. First snow in April.
1927 - Wednesday. Went to choir practice. Came home and worked.
1928 - Friday. Played Radcliff. We won 25 - 8. Yeah! Hooray
1929 - Saturday. Lincoln Mem, Wash. mon., Smithson Inst., Mt. Vernon, movie "Strong Boy" at Fox.
1930 - Sunday. Had driving lesson. First one! I got nervous & so did Mother.
1926 - Wednesday. Had a music lesson.
1927 - Thursday. Went to Church at night.
1928 - Saturday. Went to town. Came home and played with the McCabes.
1929 - Sunday. Went to Cathedral. Arlington Cemetery, St. John's Church. Wrote postals.
1930 - Monday. We had Coamy but it wasn't such a hot one as masquerade. Mother was in play. Very good tonight.
1926 - Thursday. Played baseball.
1927 - Friday. Worked and played. Went to Church for an hour.
1928 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church
1929 - Monday. Postoffice, stations, Bureau of Prn. and Engr., White House, Capitol, Congl. Library, Corcoran Art Gallery (awful).
1930 - Tuesday. Plaid Pups beat Peps. They've won 3 now & lost 0 while we've won 2 & lost 0!
1926 - Friday. Started some plants.
1927 - Saturday. Went to Earls. Had a good time.
1928 - Monday. Had Smith Mt. Holyoke game. They won 24 - 18 but Miss Long cheated. ?
1929 - Tuesday. Treas. Pan Am Bldg, Red Cross Bldg (Museum!!) Linc. Museum. In aft. saw "Broadway Melody."
1930 - Wednesday. Came home and washed hair.
1926 - Saturday. Went to Earls.
1927 - Sunday. Easter. Got 2 ½ lb. egg. Went up to Earles. Went to S.S. and Church.
1928 - Tuesday. Had Coamy. We also played baseball.
1929 - Wednesday. St., War & Navy Bldg, Navy Bldg, War Bldg, Science Bldg, Annapolis, Congress Library (night), Lighted capitol.
1930 - Thursday. Had basketball practice, I think. Aren't I naughty to forget.
1926 - Sunday. Went to S.S. Mr. Clarke taught us.
1927 - Monday. Went swimming. Worked on workbook at night.
1928 - Wednesday. Came home. My ankle is strained. (Like heck!) (I was angry that day - 1930!) (I remember!)
1929 - Thursday. Boohoo! Hoover didn't receive!! Fisheries, Nat. museum, shopping and at nite saw Clara Bow in "Wild Party"
1930 - Friday. Went to Church at 1:40 P.M. & also to Trinity at night with A.H, M.W, and her Ma. We(?)
1926 - Monday. Big fight. "Hunkey" took John's b. mitt.
1927 - Tuesday. Played tennis. First day. I think it is great.
1928 - Thursday. My ankle is better. (P.S. I really forgot what I did that day! Tee Hee! 1930)
1929 - Friday. Scottish temple, Capitol. (Supreme Court, Congress) embassies, legacies, zoological park, cemeteries, old mne home, Catholic U., monastery and we packed.
1930 - Saturday. It rained; so I fooled around in morning. Played tennis on porch. Mary Wells came over in afternoon.
1926 - Tuesday. Scrubbed kitchen with Betty Wheat.
1927 - Wednesday. Went to Miss Clarke's. Made up prayer for Sunday.
1928 - Friday. Played around with P.T. and Franee.
1929 - Saturday. We were on train for 11 hrs. D. and A.N. came as far as Harrisburgh. Mr. V.P. brought us to Sew.
1930 - Sunday. Went to S.S. *& church. Bill took me to station in our new Ford. Went to Mrs. Smith's. Mildreditait la!
1926 - Wednesday. Had music lesson. Betty Wheat came over
1927 - Thursday. Went swimming. I had good time. Swam from 9 ft. to 5 ft.
1928 - Saturday. Went up home. Saw grandma.
1929 - Sunday. Played with Mary Wells. Talked of Washington.
1930 - Mary Wells came over after. spent conference & Detention & Math period on Math test. Got 87 ½.
1926 - Thursday. Betty Wheat came over. Picked sticks out of yard.
1927 - Friday. Went to Baseball. Mrs. Emerick got a baby boy. Fred Junior.
1928 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church and played around.
1929 - Monday. Basketball practice. First day at school after vacation.
1930 - Tuesday. Made an awful noise in conference (laugh.) Red T's beat Peps 28 -18. Rotten game. We play Plaid Pups now for champion.
1926 - Friday. Planted seeds. Raked garden. Picked flowers in Houstins.
1927 - Saturday. Went to Earles. Had a good time. Snowed horror today.
1928 - Monday. Hooray! We beat Smith. Rah Rah! I won foul shooting contest.
1929 - Tuesday. Only got "very good." I came home and worked.
1930 - Wednesday. Went to town. A.H & I met Mother. Went to see "High Society Blues." Then to William Penn for supper & drove home.
1926 - Saturday. Went to Karl's. He had his tonsils out. Also went to Earl's. babies name Milton John S.
1927 - Sunday. Read funnies. Went to S.S. and Church and Church at night with M.W. V.P.
1928 - Tuesday. Played baseball.
1929 - Wednesday. Stayed after school and studied. Peggy threw P.S. at me. Served at church supper. Sheibie wasn't there.
1930 - Thursday. Mr. Wadsworth got mad at us! Mary Well & I went to library & hunted English material She treated me!
1926 - Sunday. Sam Muzzy died but we didn't know yet where he was.
1927 - Monday. Went swimming. Almost drowned. Am learning to jump in over my head.
1928 - Wednesday. Got up. Ate - went to school - ate - went to school - played - ate - went to bed. Church supper. Saw dear nice Scheily?
1929 - Thursday. Came home! Also, I went to Peggy's. It rained. Mrs. Atckly gave me dickens for studying in her room.
1930 - Friday. We beat the "Y" 28 - 24, but played rottenly, especially me. I don't see why Dickie (Mother! hee hee!) even left me in.
1926 - Monday. Found Sam's body in river. I have his ruler.
1927 - Tuesday. Stayed at home. Went to Third floor and helped work.
1928 - Thursday. Peggy came over.
1929 - Friday. Game with Ellis. I played one quarter. We won. I didn’t make one point. 4 girls wore my clothes. I was sent to office!!!
1930 - Saturday. Went to town. Got lots of things. Then went to Mrs. Smiths. Got very tired today.
1926 - Went to Frances Emerys.
1927 - Wednesday. Rested and then went to Church and served supper.
1928 - I must have forgotten this because I'm down here (1929)
1929 - Saturday. Got hot new dress, slippers and hat! Went to Earl's.
1930 - Sunday. Slept late. Mary Wells was over in aft. Played with yo-yo. Went to church at night. Dr. Howell praught.
1926 - Wednesday. Had music lesson.
1927 - Thursday. Helped around and worked and read.
1928 - Saturday. Went up home. It snowed today.
1929 - Sunday. Awful hailstorm. John had wreck. I studied etc.
1930 - Monday. Played Dot Bell in tennis. Singles Beat her 6-1, 6-2. I believe I've forgotten the exact score.
1926 - Thursday. Frances Emery and Betty Wheat came over.
1927 - Friday. Scrubbed kitchen, washed dishes. Dave Oliver's father died. No school.
1928 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church.
1929 - Monday. Girls came over. We just fooled around.
1930 - Tuesday. BooHoo! Red T's lost last & only game to Plaid Pups 18-16. Close game! It was best we had played except once(?)
1926 - Friday. Betty Wheat came over. We picked violets.
1927 - Saturday. Sold "Heart Tags" Got two movie passes. M.W.V.P. was with me.
1928 - Monday. Played baseball.
1929 - Tuesday. Got excellent. Afterwards there was baseball. Went up street with Louise Lippincott.
1930 - Wednesday. Beat Laura Noaker & Winnie Miller in Doubles with Franny 6-0, 6-2. I believe good game. Laura peachy.
1926 - Saturday April 12. Nance Showers got a baby - Sally. There was no more room on that page! She surely is lucky.

caption.para: With Mary Wells at Capitol, Wasington, D.C. - April 1929

listitem.para: 1926 - Saturday. Frances Emery came ofver. Stayed for lunch and we planted onions. Went to Betty's party.
1927 - Sunday. Picked violets. Went to S.S. and Church and Church at night.
1928 - Tuesday. Played tennis with Franny.
1929 - Wednesday. Had foul shooting contest. I came in second. 8 out of 20. Nancy Chaise won with 9 out of 20!!.
1930 - Thursday. Played doiubles. Effie and I beat Dot Bell and Eda Ferguson 6-0 6-1!! Only day I didn't have conference.
1926 - Sunday. Betty Wheat came over. We picked violets. Got chased out.
1927 - Monday. Went to see Mrs. Emerick and baby. He is very cute and she is better.
1928 - Wednesday. Played around.
1929 - Thursday. Had Coamy. Crutchy had refreshments! Those notty girls came. E. Craig, A. Brown, E. Cambell, M.Miller.
1930 - Friday. Played singles. Beat Peggy Griffiths 6-2, 6-1. Played with M.W. against B. Dunsford & R. Brooks. Won 6-3.
1926 - Monday. Mother's grand birthday. (37) Gave her shirts and card table.
1927 - Tuesday. Mother's Birthday. (38) We gave her Flower for coat, step-ins and slippers.
1928 - Thursday. Played over at school. Gave Ma a negligee. (39)
1929 - Friday. Went to Penn at nite. Afterwards we got lost. Didn't get home till two! Whew! Some evening, I'll say. Mother's birthday. (40) Gave her stockings, fudge, and slippers.
1930 - Saturday. Gave mother new piano stool (41) Went to Mrs. Harbison Woods - lunch. Town with Effie & Helen Morse. Went to Earls & home at nite.
1926 - Tuesday. Worked hard in garden.
1927 - Wednesday. Y.O.M.C.A meeting. We had a great time. Two little kittens got out of box. All of them out later.
1928 - Friday. Had play rehearsal.
1929 - Saturday. Played around with M.W. V.D. Didn't get up till late on account of last night.
1930 - Sunday. Au routine. Went to M.W.'s Had a driving lesson. I was a little better.
1926 - Wednesday. Had moosic lesson the Daily Routine.
1927 - Thursday. Went in swimming. Had a grand time.
1928 - Saturday. Went to town. Got hat and waist.
1929 - Sunday. Went to S.S. etc. Fooled around most all day!!! Had queer game in tree, all those girls and P.Townsend.
1930 - Monday. Played tennis. Algebra all afternoon - 2 hours. He surely loves us!
1926 - Thursday. Worked in garden.
1927 - Friday. Went to baseball.
1928 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church. Wore new suit.
1929 - Monday. It rained. Went to Frannys. We fooled around.
1930 - Tuesday. Played Simonsons. Beat them 28-26. Terrible place. I made 6 baskets, 12 points. B.Wheat & Helen Morse 7 points & Ruth - 2 points. Best game I have played!
1926 - Friday. Scrubbed Kitchen.
1927 - Saturday. Scrubbed kitchen and then went to town.
1928 - Monday. Play rehearsal. Had music lesson.
1929 - Tuesday. Dress rehearsal for our hot play. Music lesson. Got Excellent!!!
1930 - Wednesday. Played tennis with Mary Wells. We only got to play 15 minutes. Refereed Helen Morse's game. Bill was there.
1926 - Saturday. Went up to Earls. Saw his new house.
1927 - Sunday. Slept late but went to Church at night. Hippy came over. Went to church with us.
1928 - Tuesday. Play rehearsal.
1929 - Wednesday. Game at Shadyside. We lost 15 - 5 Boo Hoo!!
1930 - Thursday. Wadsie doesn't like our books! Got beaten in singles 6-1, 6-0 by Mary Durham! She cuts, but is good!
1926 - Sunday. Went to Sunday School.
1927 - Monday. Went swimming over my head across the pool.
1928 - Wednesday. Played tennis with Betty Wheat. Had play! I was my great-grandpa. F.E. and I wrote it.
1929 - Thursday. Went to town. Got wigs. Also saw Teddy Joyce. Last time Boo Hoo! He is so cute!! Going to Baltimore.
1930 - Friday. S.A. tied Arnold 6-6 in a called game. Went to High School Play. Good! M. Durham & Jenny Rose beat us 6-1, 6-0! Boo hoo!
1926 - Monday. Worked in garden.
1927 - Tuesday. Had a C.M. Initiated Happy Had a lot of fun.
1928 - Thursday. Came home and worked. Took Latin Competitive.
1929 - Friday. We beat Arnold 17-0 We gave Esther or Eyther. I was Mr. Turlington Jr., the hero. Went to Tallman's dance at night. Got Palmer button.
1930 - Saturday. Went to town with M.W. & Aunt Hat. Went to M.W.'s for dinner. Lots of fun.
1926 - Tuesday. Picked flowers in Houstins.
1927 - Wednesday. Had tennis match. Frannee and myself against M.W.V.P. and Peggy. We won 6-1 6-2.
1928 - Friday. John went to Princeton.
1929 - Saturday. Got a new dress. Went to Earls.
1930 - Sunday. Went to S.S. & Episcopal Church. Went riding with Emericks. Got back about nine. Loads of fun.
1926 - Wednesday. Had a music lesson.
1927 - Thursday. Hippy and Dassy and Virginia McCabe came over. They came to see kittens.
1928 - Saturday. Went up home. Gramma came home.
1929 - Sunday. Have a cold in eye. It hurts. Did my weekly routine.
1930 - Monday. Took music lesson. Miss Morse is better. I got "Excellent" but didn't deserve it! Mrs. Atchly bawled me out!
1926 - Thursday. Went to lightbearers.
1927 - Friday. Had baseball. I as on team that won. It was Miss Long's.
1928 - Sunday. Went to Church and Church at night. Played at Peggy's. Mother's Day. Poor Billy our friend died. He was nine years old. Sad, sad, sad!! Boo Hoo!
1929 - Monday. It rained real hard. I stayed in and helped with our class book.
1930 - Tuesday. Got called to office just on account of Miss Morrison & Mrs. Atchly - the bums - I was scared! Mary Wells came for dinner.
1926 - Friday. Frances E. went away. M.W.V.P. came over.
1927 - Saturday. Went to Hippy's for lunch and to Crutchies later.
1928 - Monday. Played volley-ball. Darned a stocking.
1929 - Monday. Got a permanent wave. Gee! I love it !!! It took 2 hrs. It was fun!!!!
1930 - Wednesday. Came home after history conference. Mrs. Atchly was very polite to me today! I hope her conscience hurts.
1926 - Saturday. Phew I'm tired. I worked all day and got $.20.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church and to Church at night. Lolled around all day.
1928 - Tuesday. Played tennis. Had E.M. Got new bird. His name is William Edward Sheibles Jennings. (Nickname Billy)
1929 - Tuesday.
1930 - Thursday. Gym practice. Lots of fun. Rained like fury. It's quite cold tonight. I'm reforming, Diary. (2 nites in succession)
1926 - Sunday. Went to Sunday School. Learned memory work.
1927 - Monday. Went to Crutchie's for lunch and swimming in the afternoon.
1928 - Wednesday. Played volley ball. Peggy Townsend sprained her thumb.
1929 - Tuesday. Went to school in morning, but in aft. I had to go to bed! My eye is simply terrible ( 2?)
1930 - Friday. S.A. lost to Shadyside 9-1. Latin conference today. Practiced play in aft. Party at Ruth's at night. Lots of fun.
1926 - Monday. Frances Emery came over. We had our "em."
1927 - Tuesday. Frannee and Hippy came over. We played baseball.
1928 - Thursday. Played and worked. Nancy Lippincott treated me. Played at Peggy T's in evening.
1929 - Wednesday. Had ice on eye in moning. Went to school for Latin Comp. in aft., then back to bed.
1930 - Saturday. Saw "The Return of Dr. Fu Manchu." Also Wesley ? Went to Smith's Gave Earl 3 tennis balls.
1926 - Tuesday. hyllis Stewart's birthday.
1927 - Wednesday. Mary Wells Van Pelt came over. We read Old Fashioned Girl together. It is very funny.
1928 - Friday. Played tennis. Had a good time. Went down to Emericks at night.
1929 - Thursday. My eye drained today; so I had to sit around all day with a pad on my eye. It is better, tho.
1930 - Sunday. Rained! Went to S.S. Had 1 ¾ hrs. driving lesson with Charlie Gordon. He is very nice.
1926 - Wednesday. Skipped music lesson that day.
1927 - Thursday. Lu Lippincott came over. Went to Miss Clarkes later.
1928 - Saturday. Went up home. Aunt Hat took Earl and me to the Davis.
1929 - Friday. Oh! Boy! S.A. beat Shadyside!! 8-7 in an 8 inning game! Oh! What a game!!! First day at school.
1930 - Monday. Got excellent in music. Algebra all aft. Rained terribly - sucre (French) I'm very good.
1926 - Thursday. Earle's birthday. We went up there.
1927 - Friday. Umpired tennis. Went to High School Play with Franny, Aunt Hat and Hippy. Earles birthday.
1928 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church at night. Earl came down. Played baseball about all day. Earls birthday.
1929 - Saturday. Went to Earl's and Aunt Hat's sister's. Big party.
1930 - Tuesay. Gym. Dances etc. French conference. Honor Roll. I got A in Latin! Only one more! I also got C, C+, & 2 B's.
1926 - Friday. Worked around the house. Our big cat died.
1927 - Saturday. Went to S meeting Earles at Davis Theatre. Celebrated Earle's Birthday. Gave him shake. Lindburg arrived at Paris.
1928 - Monday. Played tennis tournament. I beat Peggy Griffiths 6-0 6-0.
1929 - Sunday. Did a whole pile of lessons. Didn't get up till 11 am. I was so wicked.
1930 - Wednesday. Went to oculist & to Smiths. Got out at 3. Mrs. Atchly was terribly mad at me! Marked my paper something fierce.
1926 - Saturday. Whew! Diary I have worked all day. I'm tired t-i-r-e-d.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. an Church. Not at night though. Heard Mr. T.Z Tsoo of China speak.
1928 - Tuesday. Helped serve the Episcopal Supper. Had tennis lesson.
1929 - Monday. Lost in tennis 6-0, 6-0 by Marg and Brownies. Peggy and I were together.
1930 - Thursday. Played tennis with Bunch. Ms. Atchly certainly is on the war path. She had me sent down to the office aain. I wasn't so scared this time. Getting used to it. Ride at night.
1926 - Sunday. Memory work completed. Hooray !!!!!
1927 - Monday. Went swimming. I'm learning more.
1928 - Wednesday. Played tennis. Frannee and I played our doubles. Didn't finish, but so far score is 6-2 2-0 our favor.
1929 - Tuesday. Got excellent in music. Got films. Took ride in John's car. Saw M.M.R in walkers.
1930 - Friday. Sawy Teddy Joyce!! He was peachy. Ramon Navarro in "Madrid." Came home & studied. Je suis fatigue maintenant.
1926 - Monday. Went down to Franee Emery's. had the "e.m."
1927 - Tuesday. Played Tech and Dunham. They won 6-2 6-1. Boo Hoo!
1928 - Thursday. Here is the board of ushers. Look who's first!! Sheibie!!!! Ha-ha-ha!!!
1929 - Wednesday. Got basketball award. A sweater and a silver basketball.
1930 - Saturday. Went to play practice in town with M.W. & Ruth Pitcairn. Got costumes. Went to Earles. Came home late at night. I'm very tired.
1926 - Tuesday. Had baby kittens. Had baby chickens.
1927 - Wednesday. Had C.M. at Crutchys. Had a lot of fun.
1928 - Friday. Played tennis. Had lots of fun.
1929 - Thursday. A whole pile of girls came over. We went to P.T's and back again etc.
1930 - Sunday. Mrs. Smith here all day. Bill came in a.m. & p.m. for a while. He certainly is nice. I wish he liked me!
1926 - Wednesday. Had music lesson.
1927 - Thursday. Played baseball avec Hippy, Franee and Crutchy.
1928 - Saturday. Went to S.S. picnic. Had lots of fun. Yea Dutchy.
1929 - Friday. Went for ride in the Lip's new Packard. Went to Case's at night.
1930 - Monday. Music lesson, "Excellent." Alg. all afternoon. Play practice at five. 5 lessons tonite. I couldn't go to circus - Boohoo!
1926 - Thursday. Frances E. came over. Toredown chicken coop.
1927 - Friday. Played baseball again.
1928 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church. Lolled around.
1929 - Saturday. S.A. beat Western Reserve 16-6. John put out the last man and got the ball.
1930 - Tuesday. Gym practice. French drill in conference. M.W. was over for a little while. Helped Miss Nevin type! (Mimeograph)
1926 - Friday. Started chicken coop.
1927 - Saturday. Earle came down. We played baseball and everything.
1928 - Monday. Played tennis.
1929 - Sunday. Went to all, and to Miss Bakewell's for supper.
1930 - Wednesday. Dress rehearsal for gym frolic. It didn't work so well. Dickie discouraged. Hope it'll be better demain!
1926 - Saturday. Worked on chicken coop all day. Whew. I'm all in, Diary. So good night.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. Played baseball.
1928 - Tuesday. Had tennis lesson finished Doubles, etc. Fell and hurt mi nee.
1929 - Tuesday. Stayed in till 5:10 with our Enlish "High Light's." We get it on Friday.
1930 - Thursday. Gym frolic! Came out peachy! Miss Long wonderful! Pinx's at night. Lots of fun there. Home after 11.
1926 - Sunday. Went to Sunday School. I was tired and read all day.
1927 - Monday. Saw parade. Took Earle home and missed train at night.
1928 - Wednesdsay. Lolled around. Went to baseball game, Cemetery, Parade and to Frannee's.
1929 - Wednesday. Went over to school. Went in new school. Had fun.
1930 - Friday. Went to play practice. Baseball game - town with M.W. & A.H. "Caught Short." Good. Emericks for supper here. Ride later. Bed 9:30
1926 - Went to Earles. Trolley knocked down telephone wires. Man drunk.
1927 - Tuesday. No school this week. "Scarlet Fever." Franee, Hip came over in morning and I went to Frannees in afternoon.
1928 - Hooray!!! Frannee and I won tennis Doubles Tournament. 6-1 6-1.
1929 - Thursday. Fooled around.
1930 - Friday. Saturday. Stayed home till 4:20 making costumes. Went to city. Met Earl & George. Studied hard at night - especially.
The Two Pals.
Oh we two pals.
Together are.
We have a club
Which is afar
From all the rest
Of our own friends clubs.
Our emblem is.
Two little bubs.

1927 Birthday Pres.
Earl - baseball
Aunt H. - scout knife
John - 1 dollar, candy, bathing cap
Mother - basketball and basket
Dammuddy - croquet, pen, bathing suit, books.
Aunt Nellie - candle and candlestick
Hippy - flower for dress.
Franny - cyclometer
Crutchy - penny and hanky.

caption.para: The Children Build the Coop - May, 1926

listitem.para: 1926 - Had English, French and Spelling exams. Worked on chicken coop. Got soaked in rain.
1927 - Wednesday. Frannee and Hippy came over.
1928 - Friday. Came home and worked.
1929 - Friday. Got hair set. Mrs. Griffiths took us to the game at Arnold. We beat them 17-0.
1930 - Sunday. George & Earle were here. Slept late. Took drawing lesson. Church at night. I was naughty in a.m.!
1926 - Wednesday. Had music lesson. Lost keys dawgonit.
1927 - Thursday. Hippy came over. We cooked our lunch out.
1928 - Saturday. Went to Earls. Got 3 pairs of shoes. Went to Grand.
1929 - Sunday. Was in choir at "Children's Day" hickey. Went to Mary Well's.
1930 - Monday. Dress rehearsal for plays. I was all right. For once I didn't make a mistake!!!
1926 - Thursday. Found keys. Hooray!
1927 - Friday. Frannee came over and we cooked bacon. Mother went to Cleveland.
1928 - Sunday. Went to Church. Children's Day. We took a walk in aft. Went to Church at nite.
1929 - Monday. Went to circus. Got a chameleon. Named him Cicero. Got one for John too. Studied a little. Exams tomorrow.
1930 - Tuesday. Gave the plays! I left out one line. Was Ralph in "A Fan & Two Candlesticks". Cute colonial play. Townsends in P.M. ? on Sat.!
1926 - Friday. Mowed part of lawn. Had to have a fire, so cold.
1927 - Saturday. Frannee, Hik and Crutch came over. We cooked outside. Had YOMCA meeting.
1928 - Monday. Came home and fooled around. Last day before exams. Brrrr
1929 - Tuesday. Got B+ and C- respectively. Had English and Algebra exams. English was easy, but Algebra was pretty hard. Cicero disappeared.
1930 - Wednesday. History till 4:30. Came home. Rested. Bill here! Went to bed at 11:00. Studied history till then.
1926 - Saturday. Scrubbed kitchen and finished lawn.
1927 - Sunday. Childrens Day. Was in choir. Lolled around today.
1928 - Tuesday. Had History and Latin exams. Whew! The Latin was awful.
1929 - Wednesday. Had Latin and French exam. Both were easy! hooray! They're air.(?) I got B+ and A respectively.
1930 - Thursday. Brrr! Took History exam.! Got 71 - C. It wasn't so terribly hard! Mrs. Atchley had me scared to death!
1926 - Sunday. Children's day. Got Scout knife for prize.
1927 - Monday. Franee and Hippy came over. We read. Exams start tomorrow. Brrrr.
1928 - Wednesday. Had English exam. No exam in aft. Had music lesson.
1929 - Thursday. No school. Played around with kids. Went horseback riding. Peggy took us. Lots of fun!
1930 - Friday. Took latin exam. Terribly easy. Got 86. Went to horse show with M.W. Lots of fun. Pictures in paper!
1926 - Monday. Went to Earl's. Got new shoes.
1927 - Tuesday. Had arithmetic exam. Whew it's over! It wasn't hard tho! Was exempt in others.
1928 - Thursday. Had math and French exams.
1929 - Friday. Commencement! John won name on tablet! Hooray!
1930 - Saturday. Went to town. Did some shopping & fooled around.
1926 - Tuesday. Wore new shoes. They are slick.
1927 - No exams today. Was exempt.
1928 - Friday. Commencement. I won Auxiliary medal, and got a tennis cup. Got my name on Mt. Holyoke Cup, and Honorable Mention in Latin.
1929 - Saturday. Went to town. Bought coat, hat, and dress. Saw "Noah's Ark" It's peachy.
1930 - Sunday. Children's Day. Lots of fun! Went to church at night & home early to bed. Exams demain.
1926 - Wednesday. Had music lesson.
1927 - Thursday. went in swimming. Had a lot of fun. Had latin and French exams. All over Hooray!
1928 - Saturday. Went to town. Met Earle and we went to Davis and Aldine.
1929 - Sunday. Went to all!!
1930 - Monday. Had Math in morning. Got B - 80 ½. French in aft. Terribly easy. Got 86. She was mad because I finished early.
1926 - Thursday. Dusted and worked.
1927 - Friday. Commencement. John won American Legion Medal. Frannee won Latin Comp. John left for Balt. and Wachapreague.
1928 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church and church at night. Went to Franny's in aft.
1929 - Monday. Went swimming at Dravo's. Went to Franny's for picnic super. Heaps of fun.
1930 - Tuesday. Weird day at school. Took music lesson. Got very good! Didn't leave school till 3:25!!! Rained all day!
1926 - Friday. Commencement exercises. I got 2nd Honors. Graduates, Fader, Larrimer, Shannon.
1927 - Saturday. Went to town. Got new shoes. They are quite hot!
1928 - Monday. Played tennis and worked in morning. Had meeting in afternoon.
1929 - Tuesday. Got "very good" in music. Boo Hoo! Edgworth Commencement. Mary Lormer won. A.L.A. medal. Hooray!
1930 - Wednesday. Weird schedule again. got out of school late. Studied English a wee mite. Went for a ride.
1926 - Saturday. Scrubbed kitchen. Did part of lawn.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church. Lolled around.
1928 - Tuesday. Played tennis in morning. Ate at Phody's. Played in aft.
1929 - Wednesday. Fooled around. Franny left for Princeton. Picnic is all off. Nobody'd come.
1930 - Thursday. I got basketball award. Silver basketballs. I have 3 now! English exam! Hooray! They're over. I got a B. I wrote an awfully dumb theme. History in aft.
1926 - Sunday. Went to Sunday School. Played with Bert.
1927 - Monday. Cut rest of grass. Can't remember anything else. Poor Diary. I'm sorry!
1928 - Wednesday. Went on hike. Rhody, Sissy, Fanny, M.W. and I and also Harry the dog!
1929 - Thursday. Mary Wells Van Pelt came over. We just fooled.
1930 - Friday. Commencement! Only got Perfect Attendance. First year! Frany was honor student, not like last year. Too bad.
1926 - Monday. John decided to have tonsils out again.
1927 - Tuesday. Went in swimming. Franee and Hippy came over in afternoon.
1928 - Thursday. Played around with kids. Went to F.A.H and got awful sick.
1929 - Friday. Went to Mary Well's for lunch. Picnic at Crutchie's in evening.
1930 - Saturday. Mother home! Surprise! School today, math & French. Then luncheon for Form F kids. Mr. Link was just darling! I do like him so, but he doesn't like me!
1926 - Tuesday. John had tonsils out. He said "Goodnight, goodnight."
1927 - Wednesday. Had C.M. Ate lunch out. I mean refreshments were served by Hippy.
1928 - Friday. Am still sick and scared because of the recital.
1929 - Saturday. Went to town. I saw "The Donovan Affair." It ain't so hot. Got stocking - evening dress. Kittens born! May, June and July!!!
1930 - Sunday. Slept late. So hot I about died. Shooy & Dickie & Bunch & I played croquet. They won (Shooy & Dickee). Bill was here tonite. Ummm!
1926 - Wednesday. Brought John home. Fine. Had a music lesson. Last one.
1927 - Thursday. Hippy came over after swimming and stayed all day.
1928 - Saturday. Had the recital. It came off finely. I played "The Wooden Shoe Dance."
1929 - Sunday. Went to Sunday school and two churches.
1930 - Monday. Took math & French exams. Math was worse in History. French was pie. I got 67 and 84 respectively. Lib Crampton took us up.
1926 - Thursday. Went to Frances Emery's. Painted pictures. Ha Ha Ha Ha.
1927 - Friday. Went to Kennywood Park. Won a clock. For once I was lucky, Diary!
1928 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and church.
1929 - Monday. M.W. came for lunch. Played croquet.
1930 - Tuesday. Did latin in a.m. History in p.m. & music lesson. Played croquet tonight.
1926 - Friday. Practiced for Sunday School to lead talk. Started to cut grass.
1927 - Saturday. Hippy and Franee came over. Played croquet.
1928 - Monday. Played with girls.
1929 - Tuesday. Stayed home. Had music lesson. Got "Excellent." She gave me a Nevin piece.
1930 - Wednesday. Latin College Board. Hooray ¾ over. Got 87. Went up with Crutchy & back with D. Tallman. It was easy. Swimming & hist. in aft.
1926 - Saturday. Finished lawn. Scrubbed kitchen. John is better.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church. Not at night. Lolled around.
1928 - Tuesday. Franny and M.W. came over. We looked for a place for our picnic.
1929 - Wednesday. It's so hot that I just stayed at home and rested. Kittens are fine.
1930 - Thursday. Studied history all day at school or did I see a lot of erasers? Ow! my feet! a boy on either side of me. Jackie Me Dickie.
1926 - Sunday. Let talk. Had to have a fire.
1927 - Monday. Had first music lesson this year. Miss Moore. Had fun at Hippys. Mowed lawn.
1928 - Wednesday. Couldn't have picnic because it rained. Dagnab it.
1929 - Thursday. Diary, it's so funny! I had a good time today!! Mais comment.
1930 - Friday. Went up with Dunsfords. Wreck. Down with John. Hip!Hip! John came home & last College Board! History. I don't know whether or not I passed. (I go 70, put in later).
1926 - Monday. Went to town. John much better.
1927 - Tuesday. Went in swimming. Marion Snowdon too. Hippy came over in afternoon.
1928 - Thursday. Went down to Case's in aft. and for supper.
1929 - Friday. Mary Wells came for lunch. Had a good time.
1930 - Saturday. Slept late. Played tennis with Mary Wells. She came for lunch and aft. I beat her at croquet.
1926 - Tuesday. Went to Catholic wedding. Florence Cook to Edward Gaffney.
1927 - Wednesday. Played around. It is getting hot!
1928 - Friday. Had to have our picnic on Mary Well's porch. Darn it!!!
1929 - Saturday. Went to Earl's. Fooled around.
1930 - Sunday. Went to Bill's baccalaureate services. He was cute as anything! His ma' n' pa' brought us home.
1926 - Wednesday. Worked around the house.
1927 - Thursday. Went swimming. Had a fine time.
1928 - Saturday. Went to town. Got a lot of stuff.
1929 - Sunday. Went to church. Fooled around in afternoon. Peggy came home!! Hooray!!!
1930 - Monday. Slept late. Went up to Bunchi's. Her last day here. Wanted to swim but nobody called M.W.
1926 - Thursday. Frances Emery came over. I had a lot of fun.
1927 - Friday. Went to Mary Well's and played History game.
1928 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church.
1929 - Monday. Campbell's dance!! The best dance I've been to!! Was favored 7 times - 2 cot. out of 3 etc.
1930 - Tuesday. Went to Mildred's graduation. Gave her pen & pencil set. Bill was graduated tonite. He looked darling.
1926 - Friday. Went up to Earl's. Stayed a long time.
1927 - Saturday. John came home! Hooray. He saw Lindbergh. I hope to see him soon too.
1928 - Monday. Went down to Franny and for lunch. (I'm halfway through this book.)
1929 - Tuesday. Got excellent in music!! Went to M.W.'s.
1930 - Wednesday. Played tennis with Ruth & then we went swimming with the kids. Lots of fun at ravo's.
1926 - Saturday. Betty Wheat came over. Got caught in storm. Went barefoot.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church and to Church at night. Played around.
1928 - Tuesday. Mailed Ma's package. Fooled around.
1929 - Wednesday. Weeded. Got back-ache!! Rested. Gave Peggy her present. She goes tomorrow. Boo!Hoo!!!!!
1930 - Thursday. Went swimming. Slept late. Went to town twice. John in aft. & Aunt Hat's brother in evening. Sleepy tonite.
1926 - Sunday. 12 yrs. Franee came over, last time. Had a lovely birthday.
1927 - Monday. 13 yrs. Had Hippy, Alice G. and Franny for dinner. Played croquet. They each won a prize, pillow, hatbox, and fancy shoehorn.
1928 - Wednesday. 14 yrs. Took Effie, Crutchy, and Petie to the Davis. Had a lovely birthday.
1929 - Thursday. 15 yrs. Ahem -Had Effie, M.W., Pinkney, Crutchy and Dossie, for a lawn supper. Croquet tournament. Word game! Peachy time, nice presents.
1930 - Friday. 16 yrs. Well! The last birthday in this book. Had a lovely one. No party, but I went to Crutchy's ce soir.
1926 - Monday. Betty Wheat came over.
1927 - Tuesday. Went swimming, then to Hip's for lunch, and played History game in afternoon.
1928 - Thursday. Earl came down. Peggy left.
1929 - Friday. Mary Wells was here for dinner. Went to L.Fair. John, Looie and Dammuddy went to Carlisle in Ford!
1930 - Saturday. John let me back some more tonight. That's about all I did with the car.
1926 - Tuesday. John's last day here.
1927 - Wednesday. Stayed at home. Gave Franny her present. She leaves tomorrow for camp.
1928 - Friday. Mommer left. Boo hoo. Wah-blub-blub.
1929 - Saturday. Went to the Penn. Saw the "Idle Rich." It was good. Went to Earl's.
1930 - Sunday. Got my learner's permit. However I didn't drive today. Mother took us for 50 mi. to one ? Mt. Emerick in aft.
1926 - Wednesday. John left. Great sadness.
1927 - Thursday. Bought some fireworks. Its hot. Finished grass. Played croquet. Learned to float better.
1928 - Saturday. Worked on that blinkety blank ? paper. Got fireworks.
1929 - Sunday. Effie's birthday. Went down. Just fooled. Johnny Booth got baptised. Hurrah! Hooray!!
1930 - Monday. Prepared for trip tomorrow. Had my hair set etc. I'm all excited dear diary! You're going mecum.

formalpara.title: MEMORANDA
formalpara.para:
Chautauqua Song
1. Oh it isn't any trouble just to l-a-u-g-h.
Oh it isn't any trouble just to l-a-u-g-h.
Whenever you're in trouble it will vanish like a bubble
If you'll only take the trouble
just to l-a-u-g-h.
2. ha-ha-ha-ha-ha.
3. s-m-i-l-e.
Refrain.
Booster, booster be a booster.
Don't be grouchy as you uster.
Booster, booster be a booster.
And boost for your own home town. Sung to tune of "Glory,Glory Hallelujah"

listitem.para: 1926 - Thursday. I cut part of the grass. I sure got tired.
1927 - Friday. Got up in the morning and went to bed that night.
1928 - Sunday. Went to church. Fooled around.
1929 - Monday. Weeded garden. Went to Legion Fair at night. Won a sack of sugar at "Bingo."
1930 - Tuesday. Wonderful trip over to Carlisle! It rained, though. Dammuddy & Aunt Nellie gave us good time.
1926 - Friday. Finished cutting the grass. Baked a cake.
1927 - Saturday. Went to Earles. Brought him home with us.
1928 - Monday. Oh!! Worked on walls. Gee!! It's awful.
1929 - Tuesday. Went to fair, but didn't take chances. Went with Frannee.
1930 - Wednesday. Visited Bellair Park. Took a ride to Doubling Gap. Saw "No, No Nanette" in afternoon. Quite a good picture.
1926 - Saturday. Scrubbed kitchen. Worked around the house.
1927 - Sunday. Played croquet and basketball. Didn't go to S.S. or Church. Naughty - naughty.
1928 - Tuesday. Worked on walls. Oh! But it's tough!!!
1929 - Wednesday. Won a book of tickets for Ford for Aunt Hat and a big dog for Dossie.
1930 - Thursday. Took driving lesson in a.m. Drove to Doubling Gap. Went swimming at Pine grove set apres midi. Lots of fun.
1926 - Sunday. Hooray! The Fourth. Went up to Earls and brought him home.
1927 - Monday. Celebrated with $4.25 worth of fireworks. Blew a cut into my finger.
1928 - Wednesday. Mildred and Gramma came down. I had $3.00 worth. Boo Hoo. I lost my watch.
1929 - Thursday. I had $1.50 worth. Helped Aunt Hat win a Felix Cat at Fair. Franny was with us. Set off Looie's crackers.
1930 - Friday. Went swimming at Bellair Park in a.m. Movies "Young Eagles" in aft. & ride to York Springs. Watched fireworks tonite.
1926 - Monday. Celebrated the "Fourth." Had $3.15 worth of fireworks.
1927 - Tuesday. Played around with Earle and the kids. Cleaned the yard.
1928 - Thursday. Went swimming. I found my watch. Hooray.
1929 - Friday. No luck tonight. I didn't win one thing! Boo Hoo!!
1930 - Saturday. Second lesson in four days. I'll get my license? Oh yeah? Such enthusiasm!!!
1926 - Tuesday. Earl here. Betty Wheat came over and got mad and went home.
1927 - Wednesday. Broke my glasses. First time in four years.
1928 - Friday. Worked on the walls, Mildred and I doing the bathroom.
1929 - Saturday. Won a book of tickets for Ford, but to no avail. Some lady from Carnegie won it!! Boo Hoo!!
1930 - Sunday. Everybody so agreeable today! Yeah!? I had to get a lemonade to stake off the boredom. Can't even take a ride.
1926 - Wednesday. Had Betty over again. Made up with her.
1927 - Thursday. Went and had glasses fixed. Got a new raincoat.
1928 - Saturday. Went to Davis. Took day off. Gramma went home. Mildred stayed.
1929 - Sunday. Slept till 11:00 o'clock. Fooled around doing nothing.
1930 - Monday. Had last fatal driving lesson before tomorrow. I'm so nervous & worried! Telegram (C.B.'s) from ?
1926 - Thursday. Aunt Hats party. Earl and I stayed up till 12:40.
1927 - Friday. Played around. Earle is to stay another whole week.
1928 - Sunday. Slept late. Fooled around.
1929 - Monday. Washed hair. Lolled around.
1930 - Tuesday. Got College Board Marks. Passed driver's test. Am an authorized drive now! Hooray!
1926 - Friday. Earl went home. Went with him. I had fun up there.
1927 - Saturday. Waited on tables at Episcopal Church. Got sore throat.
1928 - Monday. Went swimming. Finished paper. Hooray!!!!
1929 - Tuesday. Music lesson. Got excellent. Had hair set. Had little kittens outside. "May, June and July."
1930 - Wednesday. Drove to Honeybrook. Aunt Rose. cous'ns Hermina & Catherine. I drove 38 mils home. Lots of fun. Lunch it ?.
1926 - Saturday. Went to Margy's for lunch, and then to the Dog, Ponie and Baby Show. Had picture taken.
1927 - Sunday. Stayed at home. Didn't feel very well. Was better tonight.
1928 - Tuesday. Went in swimming with Mildred. Had music lesson. Worked.
1929 - Wednesday. Played with kittens.
1930 - Thursday. Came home. Engine trouble at Alexandria. 3 hrs. delay "Coasted" home. Burny smell Hurray! lunch at 3:30.
1926 - Sunday. Last day of Sunday School. Boo Hoo. When I came home, my teeth were chattering. I was cold.
1927 - Monday. Was still punk. I have a sore throat on both sides.
1928 - Wednesday. We went in swimming for ten minutes. We had fun.
1929 - Thursday. Ditto as to Wed.
1930 - Friday. Unpacked etc. Didn't do anything much. Called Franny. She got drivers license! I beat her!!
1926 - Monday. Played with my rabbit.
1927 - Tuesday. Played with basketball. I feel rotten.
1928 - Thursday. We went swimming. Hardly anyone there.
1929 - Friday. I don't know what I did. I just fooled around.
1930 - Saturday. Franny, Libby & I went for a dip because Margy Glenn didn't feel so hot. Worn out, I guess.
1926 - Tuesday. Wrote John a letter. Got up early to weed garden.
1927 - Wednesday. Mary Wells came over in afternoon. Wrote letter to Mildred.
1928 - Friday. Mildred and I went swimming. Had fun.
1929 - Saturday. Went to town. Came back again.
1930 - Sunday. Went to S.S. not to church. Drove Aunt Hat up in the heights.
1926 - Wednesday. Went on "Homer Smith," had a lot of fun. Had letter from John.
1927 - Thursday. Just sat around. I don't feel very well. I got sick tonight. Have to go to bed.
1928 - Saturday. Took Mildred home and brought Phyllis home.
1929 - Sunday. Fooled around. Read funnies, etc.
1930 - Monday. Went to Hoparisons? & Wordrops. Mended hymnbooks. Supper heights(?) Had a grand time. We weeded garden.
1926 - Thursday. Cut grass, part of it. Went calling at night. Had fires and comforts at night.
1927 - Friday. I don't mind staying in bed today for I don't feel well. I have swollen glands.
1928 - Sunday. Mrs. Emerick came up with Junior. We lolled around. I have sore throat.
1929 - Monday. Went to town. Brought Mildred down. Mother came home. Then left.
1930 - Tuesday. Took moosic lesson. Drove up. got "vacation lesson"! Went swimming in aft.
1926 - Friday. Cleaned chicken coop and play house. Fixed playhouse up.
1927 - Saturday. I feel better now. My temp. is getting lower.
1928 - Monday. Mrs Emerick came up with Junior. A new girl - Margaret - came with him.
