1929 - Tuesday. Got excellent in music.5 in a row now. Hooray!! Mildred and I wrote letters.
1930 - Wednesday. Went swimming in aft. after I weeded in a.m.
1926 - Saturday. Scrubbed kitchen. Worked around the house. Had bank opened $6.66. Earl came.
1927 - Sunday. Have $60.66 in my bank now. Hooray!
1928 - Tuesday. Had music lesson. Margaret came over.
1929 - Wednesday. George and Mrs. Smith came down. Played croquet.
1930 - Thursday. Weeded in a.m. Went swimming with Franny in aft.
1926 - Sunday. Earl was here had a good time.
1927 - Monday. Am sitting up tonight. My temp. is normal. Hooray! I will get up tomorrow.
1928 - Wednesday. Fooled around with Phyllis. Went to bed early. Went for a walk with Margaret.
1929 - Thursday. George goes home tomorrow. Went swimming.
1930 - Friday. Got up early & weeded - 6 a.m. Went swimming at 9:30. Took a drive tonite. Saw "Holiday" at Stanley. Good!
1926 - Monday. Earl's Grandfathers birthday. Went up there.
1927 - Tuesday. Didn't do any work today. I just rested.
1928 - Thursday. Went to boat excursion. Had a fine time.
1929 - Friday. Went swimming in morning. Cut my feet up fine. I'm in a bad humor.
1930 - Saturday. 2 lucky buttons at Dov's. Rode a lot in Smith's car. Went out to "Gramp's" place. Saw Bettis Field.
1926 - Tuesday. Dusted, worked, and played.
1927 - Wednesday. Started to do my regular work after being sick.
1928 - Friday. Margaret and I went swimming.
1929 - Saturday. Adhesive tape cut my feed worse, dagnabit! I'm mad now!! Mildred played with me.
1930 - Sunday. Rode with Franny in afternoon & went swimming with Pinx at Dravo's at night also ottie(?).
1926 - Wednesday. Went to Kennywood Park. Had a grand time.
1927 - Thursday. Stayed around and played. Dusted.
1928 - Saturday. Phyllis Milton and their Ma were here. They all went home.
1929 - Sunday. Read Funnies and wrote letters. Had a good time with the kittens.
1930 - Monday. Went swimming tonite at Dravo's and made me slight cold worse. Dagnabit!
1926 - Thursday. Went to Chautauqua.
1927 - Friday. Earle's last day here. We played around all day.
1928 - Sunday. Mother got home tonight. Hooray!!!!!
1929 - Monday. Mildred went home. I have a stye now. BooHoo!! Great sadness. Feet better.
1930 - Tuesday. Got "Summer lesson" in music. I drove up. I had hardly practiced a whit! Swimming & driving.
1926 - Friday. Went to bed early.
1927 - Saturday. Took Earle home. Stayed all day.
1928 - Monday. Enjoyed mother's (presence presents). She brought me a panama hat coolie coat, bag, etc.
1929 - Tuesday. Music lesson (excellent) Hair set. Mother came home!!! Great excitement!!!
1930 - Wednesday. I will not go to bed although my cold is bad enough! I would get a cold just when there's so much swimming.
1926 - Saturday. Mrs. Garrett got a baby boy.
1927 - Sunday. Lolled around. Stayed at home. Made prauline.
1928 - Tuesday. Fooled around. Went in swimming with (?)
1929 - Wednesday. Went on boat excursion on "Greater Pittsburgh." Had a hot time. Mildered was there.
1930 - Thursday. Just had to sit around with this cold! John's last day here. Won't see Looey till September! Party at Franny's.
1926 - Sunday. Lolled around all day.
1927 - Monday. Had music lesson. Worked in garden.
1928 - Wednesday. Washed downstairs windows. Got $1.90
1929 - Thursday. Packed etc. to go to Carlisle tomorrow! Hooray!!!

1930 - Friday. John left for Canada - 3a.m. Franny came and took me up to Pinx's. She (Pinx) & I had to have colds. Franny says she has but I think it's "autre chose"! Went to Patterson's in aft. and Effies at night.
1926 - Monday. Went to Chautauqua in afternoon and evening Boy! It was good.
1927 - Tuesday. Mary Wells came over. We cooked our lunch out. Played tennis. Beat her 64. Other now 3-1 love 40.
1928 - Thursday. Dusted thoroughly. Ugh!! Went swimming.
1929 - Friday. Got up early and John drove us to Carlisle. I rode the rumble all the way!!!
1930 - Saturday. Went to town. Went to Aldine and saw Gary Cooper in "A Man From Wyoming." Very good, but sad! I cried!
1926 - Tuesday. Weeded part of garden. Had bathing suit on under the hose.
1927 - Wednesday. Went to Kennywood Park. Had a good time. Mary Wells went.
1928 - Friday. Went to Willows Pool with Eleanore Smith. We stayed in 4 ½ hours.
1929 - Saturday. In Carlisle. Got sunburned!! Went to Gettysburg, Caledonia Park for Picnic, Chambersburg, Shippensburg (Johnstons) and back!
1930 - Sunday. I was naughty & didn't go to church. Went for a ride in evening with Emericks. Wrote letter. Read funnies.
1926 - Wednesday. Got some things out for playhouse.
1927 - Thursday. Went in swimming. I had music lesson. First very good.
1928 - Saturday. Dusted around. Went to Emericks.
1929 - Sunday. In Carlisle. Went to church. Had chicken dinner. Went hunting butterflies. Got 3. Supper at Dammuddy's.
1930 - Monday. Stayed home and wrote more letters. I've finished now. I wish my darned cold would go away!
1926 - Thursday. Went up to Earls.
1927 - Friday. Mary Well's last day here. She came over.
1928 - Sunday. Lolled around. Read funnies, etc.
1929 - Monday. In Carlisle. Went Butterfly hunting. Got all muddy. Went to Johnstons and Chambersburg for dinner.
1930 - Tuesday. No music lesson. Went to Mary Ott's party. Had a lovely time, but I played dumb bridge.
1926 - Friday. Boiled water on little stove in playhouse.
1927 - Saturday. Mary Wells left for Phillie with Mary Thorne White.
1928 - Tuesday. July 31. Am having a sore throat now. I have tonsillitis.
1929 - Tuesday. Came home! I rode in the rumble all the way. Was sorry to leave!!!
1930 - Wednesday. Saw Joe E. Brown in "Top Speed." Very good! Went up to Smith's afterwards. Came home 10:35 p.m.
1926 - Saturday. Fried bacon and made tea on stove in playhouse.
1927 - Sunday. Read funnies and lolled around.
1928 - Wednesday Aug. 1. Am still in bed. Winnie Matthews came. She stayed all day. She's nice.
1929 - Wednesday. John went to Louis all night. I went swimming with Crutchy.
1930 - Thursday. Mended. Mr. Smith came & took us to Mt. Wash. Came home at 10:30. "Buckeye Limited," "Metropolitan" - (?)
1926 - Sunday. It's Roastingly Hot. Whew, I can't write.
1927 - Monday. Had a music lesson. It is hot today.
1928 - July 30, 1928. Monday. I am sick. I just feel rotten.
1929 - Thursday. John left for Canada. Went swimming with Crutchy and Grace. Had loads of fun.
1930 - Friday. Music lesson - very good. Present - flowers. She seemed kind of cross.
1926 - Monday. Went under the hose with Bert. Had a grand time.
1927 - Tuesday. Couldn't go in swimming because I've got so many cuts.
1928 - Thursday. Lolled around. My first day up. I feel fine though.
1929 - Friday. Worked around. Dusted, etc.
1930 - Saturday. Went to town. Didn't do much. My cold is still with me!!
1926 - Tuesday. Got maple sugar. J.B. Went under the hose with Bill and Wallie. Rained but still hot as the dickens.
1927 - Wednesday. Saw Lindbergh! Have pictures that look just like him. Went to Westview Park.
1928 - Friday. Lolled around. Went to Legion Fair at night. Won a Felix cat. Dammuddy came. Yay!!!
1929 - Saturday. Went to Mrs. Smith's. Fooled around and slept. Mama left for Columbus.
1930 - Sunday. Slept late. Bill came at noon, but didn't stay long. He allus comes at dinner time - the bum.
1926 - Wednesday. Went to Earls. Grandma had a Coster Guild meeting.
1927 - Thursday. Took a music lesson, or rather postponed it 'til tomorrow.
1928 - Saturday. Saw firemen parade. It was good. I won a big dog.
1929 - Sunday. We are all alone today (Aunt Hat and I) Boo Hoo. Fooled around.
1930 - Monday. Franny got home from conference. I washed Skinny Wink.
1926 - Thursday. Started to cut grass. Weeded a little bit.
1927 - Friday. Played with all the kids.
1928 - Sunday. Just fooled around. I didn't go to church.
1929 - Monday. Mother back!! Got home last night. I fooled around today.
1930 - Tuesday. Had music lesson. She didn't mark it.
1926 - Friday. Finished grass. Dusted. went out in the rain. Got candy up street.
1927 - Saturday. Went down to Emericks. Played around.
1928 - Monday. Dusted and worked around. I went swimming. I met Pinkney Gott.
1929 - Tuesday. Miss Moore mad. I only got "very good." BooHoo. Had hair set. Went to Pinckney's in aft. Have a cold.
1930 - Wednesday. Went swimming over at Lindsay's pool - Dickie Long, Effie, Libby & I went. Loads of fun!
1926 - Saturday. Scrubbed kitchen.
1927 - Sunday. Got up late. Lolled around all day.
1928 - Tuesday. Pinkney and I went swimming.
1929 - Wednesday. Had lunch with Pinx at Valley Catering. She came down afterwards.
1930 - Thursday. Aunt Hats brother's wife took us to town. He brot us home tonite. Saw J. Crawford in "Our Blushing Bride." Peachy.
1926 - Sunday. Wrote letters. Sat around reading.
1927 - Monday. Took music lesson. Played around. John left for Baltimore and Wachappeague.
1928 - Wednesday. Went swimming. Perfected my sidestroke.
1929 - Thursday. Mother left tonight. BooHoo!! Aunt Hat and I are all alone.
1930 - Friday. Swimming at McKnights with Franny. Charlotte was very nice. Dusted & put up clean curtains in a.m.
1926 - Monday. Cleaned chicken coop.
1927 - Tuesday. Played around. Cut grass.
1928 - Thursday. Went swimming again. I love it.
1929 - Friday. Worked. Wrote letters. Went to Emericks.
1930 - Saturday. Went swimming at Dravo's. Effie, Libby, Crutchy, Pinkney, Ottie and me. Had a grand time. Ride & cards at nite.
1926 - Tuesday. Wallie came over. We played cards. Killed rooster. BooHoo. The poor thing. BooHoo.
1927 - Wednesday. Played with the boys. Took a long ride.
1928 - Friday. What do you think I did today?!? I - oh - er - oh - forget (tsk tsk.)
1929 - Saturday. Went to town. Saw "Bulldog Drummond." Peachy! Spooky!! Brought Mildred home at nite!!
1930 - Sunday. Fooled. Got up at 10. Beat Bill & Ma at darts. Then Bill beat us. He got 223 - a record for our board.
1926 - Wednesday. Dusted. Made a cake. Took rooters spur up to be fixed.
1927 - Thursday. Played with Bert, Bill and Walter Rickey. Went for a long ride.
1928 - Saturday. Well Diary I am in a sad predicament. I am doing this on the 9th of September. I had done further on before this so don't be alarmed.
1929 - Sunday. Made candy with Mildred. An awful bat came and we had a terrible time in evening.
1930 - Monday. Went to Lin Boyd's. Horseback riding & swimming. Oodles of fun. Be seeing ya diary!
1926 - Thursday. Cleaned chicken coop. Played cards. Was hot.
1927 - Friday. Went to the Cases. Stayed 'til 12.00.
1928 - Sunday. I fooled around. Read funnies.
1929 - Monday. Went swimming with Pinkney at Dravo's. Of course Mildred went too, you no!!
1930 - Tuesday. Music - excellent. Went swimming. Dickie, Effie & I. Mrs. Atchley's. Effie's for supper & cards after.
1926 - Friday. It was terribly hot. Played cards.
1927 - Saturday. Played and dug a trench 6 ft deep.
1928 - Monday. It's too bad but all I did today was rise and go to bed and eat and swim etc.
1929 - Tuesday. Got excellent in music. We went swimming at 4:30. Had a peachy time. Only ones in , Mildred(?)
1930 - Wednesday. Went to Town and movies. Saw Ronald Colman in "Raffles" Very good!
1926 - Saturday. Rained all day. Scrubbed kitchen.
1927 - Sunday. Just lolled around and read.
1928 - Tuesday. Went swimming at "Y" At last my dive is getting better.
1929 - Wednesday. Went swimming at "Y." Had a good time. Mildred and I went.
1930 - Thursday. Wen on Sto(?) "Washington" to Rochester. Mildew George. Earl and I had fun.
1926 - Sunday. Read funnies. Lolled around all day.
1927 - Monday. Went to town. Mildred and Earl were there.
1928 - Wednesday. Went to town. Saw Lilactime. It was peachy.
1929 - Thursday. Pinckney came over in aft. We all played cards. Went thro new school.
1930 - Friday. Sore throat. Lolled around. Wrote letters. Listened to Mary and Bob on radio.
1926 - Monday. Rained all day. Dusted.
1927 - Tuesday. Earl left for L.I. N.Y. Went to see Miss McPherson.
1928 - Thursday. Went swimming.
1929 - Friday. Went swimming at Dravo's. It was so cold that I got a sore throat.
1930 - Saturday. John came home from Canada. Got here 1:30 a.m. Slept in Tenor Field till 7:15 a.m. Silly sap. Didn't wake us.
1926 - Tuesday. Rained all day. Couldn't work much.
1927 - Wednesday. Played with boys.
1928 - Friday. Went swimming.
1929 - Saturday. Throat is a little better. Still feel punk.
1930 - Sunday. Fooled around. Went for a brief ride. John here! Hooray.
1926 - Wednesday. Went up to Earles to get him and bring him home. Rained all day.
1927 - Thursday. Went to Lawn Fete in Mt. Washington. John went to Worchapreague.
1928 - Saturday. Worked and played.
1929 - Sunday. Could have gone swimming at Dravo's, but have a cold and can't.
1930 - Monday. Went to town. Saw "A Sap from Syracuse." Jack Oakie - very good.
1926 - Thursday. Cut part of grass. Rained a little bit.
1927 - Friday.12:30 this time. Went to the Cases, to dinner. Had a good time. Took lawn mowers up.
1928 - Sunday. Went to Dravo Pool with Pinkney Gott, Gwendolyn Morgan Sarah Murdock, and Priscilla.
1929 - Monday. Went to town. Saw "Wonder of Women." Also saw the return of TEDDY JOYCE!!
1930 - Tuesday. Saw Byrd pictures. Verry goot. At Sewickley show. First for long time. "Excellent" - music.
1926 - Friday. Cut grass. Cleaned chicken coop. Rained a lot.
1927 - Saturday. Dusted and worked. Roller skated.
1928 - Monday. Went swimming at "Y" with Pinks and Gwenny.
1929 - Tuesday. Couldn't take music lesson. I'm in bed with a hurt back etc.
1930 - Wednesday. Went and saw about entering High School. Fooled around.
1926 - Saturday. Scrubbed kitchen. Rained. This is the 7th day. The Ritchies came home.
1927 - Sunday. Dorothy Grimm came up. We had a fine time. Rode to Amridge and back on bikes.
1928 - Tuesday. Went to town with Dammuddy and Aunt Hat. Saw "The Forbidden Hour"!
1929 - Wednesday. Earl, Mrs. Smith, Mrs. Stewart, Karl, and Butzie came down. Only the first 2 stayed.
1930 - Thursday. Went to movies. Saw "Journey's End" Not so hot. Sewickley one.
1926 - Sunday. It didn't rain. It was hot. Lolled around.
1927 - Monday. Got lawn mowers and started grass. I am tired.
1928 - Wednesday. Went under hose at Virginia's. I got a little sun burnt. Mother got hurt. BooHoo.
1929 - Thursday. Am feeling fine. Played all day.
1930 - Friday. Drove out to Carnegie. Saw Mildew. Drove Mrs. Lorimer, Mary, etc. all around.
1926 - Monday. Earl and I had a good time playing all day. Whew I'm tired.
1927 - Tuesday. Finished the grass. Just played.
1928 - Thursday. Went swimming at new pool with Pinks, Gwenny and Sarah. I got sunburnt.
1929 - Friday. Had music lesson. Got "Excellent." Hurt my knee on bike. Boo!! Hoo!!
1930 - Saturday. Ma left. It rained. Went for Mildred. We drove to Zelienople and all around. Had loads of fun. Up late tonite.
1926 - Tuesday. Earle's last day here. We made the most of it.
1927 - Wednesday. The Cases came up. We had a real good time.
1928 - Friday. Tiger got kittens. black and orange. They're real cute.
1929 - Saturday. Went to creek and caught a bunch of minnows. Earl, Mildred and I went.
1930 - Sunday. Boohoo! Had to take Mildy back. Lots of fun sleeping late. Fooled at nite.
1926 - Wednesday. Went up to Earl's. It rained a little. This is the longest spell we've had this year.
1927 - Thursday. Washed the dogs. Played around.
1928 - Saturday. Went up home and out to park to see scouts. We had a good time.
1929 - Sunday. Earl went home. Mildy goes tomorrow. Mrs. Smith went too.
1930 - Monday. Wallie got 236 at g' darts 801 for 5 games. Read - worked - washed Skinnywink. Drove to Fresh Air Home & back in the dark - 10:15 P.M. Ma home!!
1926 - Thursday. Gee! we can hardly wait until tomorrow, "The Grand Day."
1927 - Friday. Cleaned chicken coop. Played rest of day.
1928 - Sunday. Went swimming at the Dravo Pool. We had loads of fun.
1929 - Monday. Went swimming at Willow in Oakmont. Had grand time, but got a sore throat.
1930 - Tuesday. Took music lesson. Got excellent. washed hair. Too cold to swim. Mildy home and out.
1926 - Friday. John came home!!!!! Hooray!!!!!!!! Brought me a souvenir nickel from New York.
1927 - Saturday. Went up home. Had a good time.
1928 - Monday. Franny came home. I didn't know til late. I went swimming.
1929 - Tuesday. Got "very good." I don't feel well. Terrible cold!! Sleppt in aft.
1930 - Wednesday. Pinx, Aunt Hat & I drove to Steubenville, Ohio. I had a lot of fun. "Dawn Patrol" at movie. Ate at Central.
1926 - Saturday. John's first whole day here. You can still hear our shouts from the day before.
1927 - Sunday. Franny got home. Lolled around and read all day. Went to the Emericks.
1928 - Tuesday. Franny called up. She came up. And we fooled.
1929 - Wednesday. Have a bad cold!! I just rested the whole day. Besids going to town. Saw "Say It With Songs!" at Saloon. Peachy.
1930 - Thursday. movie "Mobie Dick." Went to town. Saw Mildew. Went to Warner. Had to wait 40 minutes. Tiger got 4 kittens - too young to be born. Too little, also.
1926 - Sunday. Lolled around all day. Read funny papers.
1927 - Monday. Went swimming. Jumped in 9 ft. at last. Am learning to dive.
1928 - Wednesday. We went swimming. F.E. Pinckney, etc. at the "Y"
1929 - Thursday. Mary Wells came home!!!! Brought me a lucky cross (the dear girl) We had fire in living room.
1930 - Friday. Yes (we can't let the Tellmen beat us) - We have six cats now - the kittens are living - 2 orange, 1 black, 1 whiteish yellow. Skinnyjinks, of course, we have Amos.
1926 - Monday. Franee got home. Great rejoicing, from me at least.
1927 - Tuesday. Frannee came over. My last day here.
1928 - Thursday. Mary Wells came home. We fooled around.
1929 - Friday. Peggy came home. Was so surprised. She just popped in on us. Glad she is home.
1930 - Saturday. Pinx and Ruth I went for a ride with, after we washed car (A.H. and I) Ruth just got home.
1926 - Tuesday. Started to pack trunk. Had Franee over.
1927 - Wednesday. Could hardly wait for tonight. We are at last on our way.
1928 - Friday. Fooled around with Franny and Mary Wells.
1929 - Saturday. Went to town. Came home in the car with Aunt Hat's brother.
1930 - Slept late. Went swimming at Dravo's. I drove Pinx and Ruth over.

caption.para: 3 Linden Place - Parlor / Living Room with view of hall
Undated, but probably from Gram's childhood based upon position of photo in album

listitem.para: 1926 - Wednesday. Grandpa got sick. Went to town. Got haircut. Went to Earls.
1927 - Thursday. Went for a bus ride. Got here at 11:45. It is and was raining
1928 - Saturday. Went to town. Saw the "Tempest." It was good.
1929 - Sunday. John got home at 7:30. He is so nice and tan!! Hooray!!!
1930 - Monday. Went swimming at Dravo's mit Pinx. Had lunch at her house. Tennis at Bergs(?) - Popcorn at Polly Frederick's. Darned too!
1926 - Thursday. Went up to Earls. Grandpa is sick. Hope he will soon be better.
1927 - Friday. Took driving lesson at Nat. Went on a chair ride.
1928 - Sunday. Dammuddy, Aunt Hat and I went to Epis. Church. Mr. Reid.
1929 - Monday. Saw John in daylight. You can bet it's not lonesome now.
1930 - Tuesday. School started. I'm going to high school this year. ¾ hour wait at office & 1 hr wait for locker. Betty Terry save my life. Drove to town
1926 - Friday. Left for Carlisle and the SesquiCentennial. Had a good time on train.
1927 - Saturday. Took driving lesson at Nat. Looked around town.
1928 - Monday. Labor Day. We just fooled around. We fixed playhouse up.
1929 - Tuesday. Got excellent in mussic. Saw Mary Wells' things.
1930 - Wednesday. First real day of school. Had a hard time & am weary tonite. Betty Terry was very nice to me. Franny & I swam in aft. at McKnights. First time. Big Bolicenam "Do you want a …"
1926 - Saturday. Went to market. Wrote mother. Got a souvenir. Went to Mrs. Sharps for lunch. Played cards.
1927 - Sunday. Watched the crowd and went walking.
1928 - Tuesday. Went to doctors in town. Got Dammuddy a present. Saw "The Cardboard Lover."
1929 - Wednesday. Mother came home!! She's so tan!!! Hooray! Went to Peggy's. We wrote a letter to Teddy Joyce. He's so cute.
1930 - Thursday. Mr. Stroup had P. Speaking. Kept us laughing all the time. Gradually getting used to school. There are 10 boys and me in physics now. Took Betty Terry home twice. Miss Hubbell nice.
1926 - Sunday. Went out for dinner with Johnstons. Played with J. Shaeffer. It rained all day.
1927 - Monday. Labor Day. Watched everybody and walked around.
1928 - Wednesday. Fooled around down at Franny's. Dammuddy went home. BooHoo!!
1929 - Thursday. Peggy and I went to Mary Wells'. Had a good time.
1930 - Friday. Two Physics classes now, nineteen boys & me. Went to Ruth's. Loads of fun playing cards. Noony is awfully cute.
1926 - Wednesday. 14th Went to Sesqui. Saw bell lit up with 26000 lights. Had good time. Got more souvenirs.
1927 - Tuesday. Went in ocean. Took a chair ride at night.
1928 - Thursday. Had tonsils out. I feel punk. I didn't swear coming out of the ether. Thank goodness!
1929 - Friday. Went to town. Saw "Our Modern Maiden."
1930 - Saturday. Slept late. Went to party at Franny's. Had loads of fun. Yummy raspberry sherbert. Crutchy always wants to go for a ride!
1926 - Thursday. 15 Visited Navy Yard. Rested and slept in afternoon.
1927 - Wednesday. Went for a bus ride to Bay Head and Lakehurst. Saw Los Angeles there.
1928 - Friday. Gauze taken out of my throat. I can swallow easier. I came home. Home Sweet Home!!
1929 - Saturday. Peggy came over. Went to town with John. Got garter belt at Crutchy's.
1930 - Sunday. Slept late. Read funnies. Mrs. Graff came. Took her for a ride. Bought grapes. Got on wrong road.
1926 - Monday. 5th Rained. Went out and took pictures. Stopped at Lydia's.
1927 - Thursday. Took another driving lesson at Nat. I can do it pretty well now.
1928 - Saturday. Fixed a box and wrote a 10 page letter to F.E. and M.W. F.E. came to see me. I am better.
1929 - Sunday. Fooled around. Went to church at night. Mr. Reid is wonderful.
1930 - Monday. Didn't do anything because Franny went to town. Went to Crutchy's & said good-byes. She leaves tonight. Got books for John.
1926 - Tuesday. 6th. Went to see Molly Pitcher's grave. Sun shone brightly.
1927 - Friday. I went in ocean. Took chair ride. Played rolling bales.
1928 - Sunday. Got up for lunch. My throat is still sore. Peggy came over. We had fun.
1929 - Monday. Went to M.W.'s with Peggy. She came over in aft. Went to Peggy’s at night. A.H and John left for Andover. BooHoo! Very important but not much room.
1930 - Tuesday. BooHoo! Effie, Pinx, and Crutchy are all gone, now. Franny decided a day ago. Went to Pinx's for dinner! "Very good" in music.
1926 - Wednesday 7th. Went to Gettysburgh. Visited Battlefield, Jennie Wade's house, Church in which Lincoln sat.
1927 - Saturday. Went in ocean. Played with Peggy Cone. The ocean is fine.
1928 - Monday. Aunt Nellie came. I feel better but not so good today.
1929 - Tuesday. Got "excellent" in music. Went to Mary Wells'. Had a good time.
1930 - Wednesday. Didn't have such a hard time in Physics today. I'm getting used to them. Was vaccinated by Dr. Shavor on top leg. (per mum?)
1926 - Thursday. 8th. Went to library. Played and read most all day - and ate.
1927 - Sunday. Went to Trinity Church. It rained a little. Went to Pryor Band concert.
1928 - Tuesday. Went to Dr.'s. He is giving me a tonic. It still hurts.
1929 - Wednesday. Charlotte Davis, Peggy, Aunt Hat and I saw "The Great Murder Case" at Stanley. It was very good.
1930 - Thursday. John made Bill take me to school, the big bum. Had to go to the board in Physics. Got all my hickeys right though First chapel. Mr. Conway was nice.
1926 - Friday. 9th Visited the Johnstons at Shippensburgh. Had a good time.
1927 - Monday. Went in ocean. Took a drive to Sea Girt in Mr. Hansen's car.
1928 - Wednesday. The girls came to see me. I am much better.
1929 - Thursday. Went to oculist and dentist. Then to Mrs. Smith's.
1930 - Friday. Had a quiz in Physics. got 74. Went for a little ride. Took Mrs. Lorines horse. Hooray! No school tomorry. Fun in Glee Club.
1926 - Saturday 10th. Went to market. Got a book and read it.
1927 - Tuesday. Our last day here. I went in ocean. Said goodby to Mr. Hansen.
1928 - Thursday. Peggy's father died. We went to see her. The Coamy did.
1929 - Friday. Went to Penn. Saw "Madame X." It was very good.
1930 - Saturday. Went up to Earl's. Had a good time. I'm tired now, so g'nite!
1926 - Sunday. 11th. Went to Church. Lolled around.
1927 - Wednesday. Home at last!! Whew what a hot day.
1928 - Friday. We got ready for mum's party. Slept late.
1929 - Saturday. Franny came over. Had a grand time. It rained. Cold tonite.
1930 - Sunday. Fooled around. Slept late. Max took pictures of John K., Sooy & John, also me. Had a grand time tonite with them! (Rome - ?)
1926 - Monday 12th. Went to Philadelphia. Visited all historical things.
1927 - Thursday. Franee and M.W. came over. We had a good time.
1928 - Saturday. Went up home. We fooled around. Mr. Townsend was buried.
1929 - Sunday. Club Meeting - Church. Peggy left at night. A.H. and I went with them to town. Boo!Hoo!!!!
1930 - Monday. School again. Said goodbye to John at noon. He left this afternoon! Boohoo! I'll miss him. It's so quiet - not even tenants.
1926 - Tuesday 13th. Visited Sesqui. Had a good time getting souvenirs and going through buildings.
1927 - Friday. Frances went to town. I raked leaves. It was a hard job.
1928 - Sunday. Sunday school started. M.W. came over. Miss Morrison arrived (tsk-tsk)
1929 - Monday. Went to town. M.W. & A.H. Saw "Illusion" - Stanley and "3 Live Ghosts" - Penn. Good.
1930 - Tuesday. Had moosic lesson. Didn't look to see what I got. Skole o.k. Themes tomorrow in English.
1926 - Friday. Came home. What a sight for sore eyes. Ha ha.
1927 - Saturday. Went up to Earles. We saw the "Pride of Pittsburg."
1928 - Monday. Went to Peggy's in a.m. We painted desk. Went to town etc. in aft. My throat is much better.
1929 - Tuesday. Got "excellent." No music next week. Said goodbye to Mary Wells. Set my own hair. Tee Hee!!
1930 - Friday. Got up at 7:40. Went to school at 8:30. Home at 12 back at 12:45. Out at 4:00. Dinner at 6 p.m. Study till 10:00 p.m. Bed at 10:30.
1926 - Saturday. Unpacked trunk, had a grand time arranging my souvenirs.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and church. Rained a lot today.
1928 - Tuesday School started. Had Coamy in afternoon.
1929 - Wednesday. F.E. came over. We cleaned clubhouse, painted stove and pipes and played around.
1930 - Wednesday. Played tennis with Sally Smart. I like her lots. She lives near Franny. She got a blister, so we didn't finish the sets.
1926 - Sunday. Sunday School second Sunday. I went for the 1st time. Went up to Earls.
1927 - Monday. P.T., M.W., F.E came over. We looked at the new school.
1928 - Wednesday. Mary Wells and Peggy came over Aunt Hat etc. played bridge. First whole day of school.
1929 - Thursday. Went to town all day. To Earle's. Had a good time.
1930 - Thursday. Saw Mary Wells. We went riding around. Went to Walker's. Had a grand time. Got to drive because il ne pleuvait pas.
1926 - Monday. Betty Wheat came over. Franee came too.
1927 - Tuesday. Franee came over. We inspected school.
1928 - Thursday. Went to Mary Wells'. We toasted marshmallows.
1929 - Friday. Franny came over. We put up pipes and finished cleaning the clubhouse.
1930 - Saturday. Mary Wells' party by Mrs. Joyce! Mrs. Wood's party at nite! Boy am I weary tonite ?! G'nite diary!
1926 - Tuesday. School started!!!!!!!!!! In the aft. I went up to Earls.
1927 - Wednesday. At it again!! Half my session only. In Form II eighth grade. I am 13.
1928 - Friday. Played with M.W., F.E and P.T. We made up club song of Coamy.
1929 - Saturday. Franny came for lunch. We played around.
1930 - Sunday. Boohooboohooboohoo! Peggy isn't coming home! Sad! Sad! She misjudged the boat. See her at Xmas, tho!
1926 - Wednesday. Betty Wheat and Alice C. came over. We made fudge.
1927 - Thursday. First whole day of school. Went down to Franee's. Made candy.
1928 - Saturday. Peggy and I took out stove and fixed it. It's quite hot.
1929 - Sunday. Went to Franny's and for ride and to church at night. We miss Peggy.
1930 - Monday. Played tennis with Sally Smart. Oodles of fun. I like her lots & it too!
1926 - Thursday. Joined the "Y". Went swimming.
1927 - Peggy T, Franee, and Mary Wells came over.
1928 - Sunday. Weekly routine.
1929 - Monday. Slept late. Last day. Worked and fooled around.
1930 - Tuesday. Music lesson. Got excellent but didn't deserve it in the least. Lab today.
1926 - Friday. Went to Betty Wheat's then down to Franee's and B. Garretts.
1927 - Saturday. Went up to Earles. Played and read with Phyllis.
1928 - Monday. Went to Drs.
1929 - Tuesday. Went to town in aft. Saw "Golddiggers." School started. Have a good seat. We have Chapel every day. Mr. Link is darling.
1930 - Wednesday. S.A. opened. I half-wish I were going. I miss all the kids heaps, but I also like the kids up here at S.H.S!
1926 - Saturday. Scrubbed kitchen. Went to M.W.V.P's. Had fight with boys.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church and Church at night.
1928 - Had music lesson. Washed hair.
1929 - Wednesday. Franny came over. First whole day at school.
1930 - Thursday. Laboratory in Physics. Donald & I did a lot. Afterwards took Sally home & came home mysen(?)!
1926 - Sunday. Went to S.S. Went up to Earls'. Grandpa better.
1927 - Monday. Had music. Played hockey later.
1928 - Wednesday. Played with girls.
1929 - Thursday. Had Coamy. We initiated Pinkney. Had loads of fun.
1930 - Friday. S.H.S. lost to Crafton 20-0. Afterwards, Jane Mitchell, Sally B. Dunsford, B. Terry & I had goodies at Walker's.
1926 - Monday. Had Alice Crutchfield over. We made candy.
1927 - Tuesday. Played hockey. It's great fun.
1928 - Thursday. Went to hockey. Am very stiff.
1929 - Friday. Came home in aft. Washed hair in aft. Had it set. Went to S.A. reception at night. Mr. Sink was perfect!!!
1930 - Saturday. Went to town. Bought things etc. Saw movie -"Rain or Shine" at Stanley. Is was fair enough.
1926 - Tuesday. Lighted the furnace. Went swimming at the "Y!"
1927 - Wednesday. Went to Peggy Townsends. Had a good time.
1928 - Friday. Played with Peggy. We did our algebra. Went to party.
1929 - Saturday. M.W. came over in aft. She stayed for supper. Went home after we did our English.
1930 - Sunday. Went to Sunday School. Mrs. Bauman taught. I'm reforming at last. Went to Townsends tonite. Mr. Reid's last night at church. I'm going to miss him oodles! He was lovely!
1926 - Wednesday. Went to Choir Practice.
1927 - Thursday. Franny came over. We played around.
1928 - Saturday. Went to oculist. Went to Davis. Went up home.
1929 - Sunday. Went to church at morning and night. Down to Effie's in aft. Went for a ride.
1930 - Monday. Played tennis with Sally. We were much better. Took her to her music lesson Had fun up street.
1926 - Thursday. Went to the dentists and up to Earls.
1927 - Friday. Went to Mrs. Emericks. Played Five Hundred.
1928 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church and Church at night.
1929 - First Monday at school. Adi mi. This is Oct. 13!!!
1930 - Listened to Navy Band concert with Sally. Awfully good, but cold day. Liet. Benter was awfully nice. Liked the whole thing.

formalpara.title: MEMORANDA - Impressions of S.H.H!
formalpara.para: Mother & Natali Manuca - Ha ha! Memories of S.H.H. the first art of my junior year. Joe Cook' cute. Michael Joseph borrows my pen & pencils. Donald Baird is my partner in Physics. I'm the only girl in class of 19. Mr. Bolin teaches us. Hard at first but not now. Miss Hubbell is awfully nice. Jack Dreyfus is funny. Shirley Campbell is nice. Elizabeth Caven is class goat & goofy. The Plague?! Ha ha - name given by Betty Terry. She's nice, too. I like Sally Smart & Margaret Handy. Miss Koehler is nice but can get very cross. I'm nuts over Mr. Thome. Dumb geometry class including me - 43 of me! The first six week's tests loom up –– goodby! (for a while)

listitem.para: 1926 - Friday. Alice Brown and Crutchfield came over and Betty Wheat, Alice B. joined the "Monkey Club.
1927 - Saturday. M.W.V.P. P.E.T. F.G.E were here for lunch. Ate out. Cut grass, raked leaves.
1928 - Monday. Went to Dr.s. We almost missed train.
1929 - Tuesday. Got Excellent. poor little May, our yellow kitty died!!
1930 - Wednesday. Took music lesson got excellent. Had fun with Sally. Practiced a lot today.
1926 - Saturday. Went down to Frances. Betty Wheat was there. We pulled taffy.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church and to Church at night.
1928 - Tuesday. Had music lesson. Washed hair. P.T. and I did our Algebra.
1929 - Wednesday. Day of Sadness!! Mother left! and I buried poor little May, the
1930 - Thursday. Our little white kitten was found dead in a box. Others starving. Have to feed them. Tiger's mean. Went to look for cucumber in country.
1926 - Sunday. Rally Day. Went up to Earls.
1927 - Monday. Had music lesson and played hockey.
1928 - Wednesday. Had Coamy. We had it at Crutchy's. We had fun.
1929 - Thursday. Had Coamy, I believe. O.no. Effie came over. We made US hickeys and helped Aunt Hat.
1930 - Friday. Went to McDonald & watched SHS get beaten 40-0. Michael Joseph hurt his eye. Leo Myer played. Joe Cook couldn't.
1926 - Monday. Went in swimming. Learned Dead man's float.
1927 - Tuesday. Played hockey. It is fun.
1928 - Thursday. Went to hockey. It sure is hot today. Franny got new bike.
1929 - Friday. Forgot, but anyway, I went to school etc.
1930 - Saturday. Went to town in Fort after washing it. We saw Milton Lills in his last picture. The Sea Wolf. good!
1926 - Tuesday. Went in swimming with Jane Noaker.
1927 - Wednesday. Learned to play bridge with Miss Wood and Miss ?ness.
1928 - Friday. Went to town. Didn't have throat fixed. BooHoo. Went to Davis.
1929 - Saturday. Went to town. Got dress, hat, sweater, and middies. Brought Earl down cette soir la'!!!
1930 - Sunday. Went to S.S. Took Sally Smart. She likes Mrs. Harbison heaps. So do I. I'm glad she's back.
1926 - Wednesday. Went to choir practice.
1927 - Thursday. Went to World Series game Pitt. vs. N.Y. They lost 6-2. Lloyd Waner making both runs. Ruth fanned. It was good.
1928 - Saturday. Went to see Good News. Worked in morning.
1929 - Sunday. Earl was here. Went to S.S. and Church. Communion. Went to see Mrs. Townsend.
1930 - Monday. Went over to S.A. and gave them my two dear banners - Us & Red T's - goodbye forever! Boohoo!
1926 - Thursday. Went up to Earl's. It is very cold.
1927 - Friday. Mary Wells came over. We had a good time.
1928 - Sunday. Went to S.S. up home and back in evening. Dedication of Grace Episcopal Church.
1929 - Monday. Got excellent in moosic. Had hair washed. Shooie kept us from 1:30-3:00. The big bum.
1930 - Tuesday! What a day! In Physics, I had my finger burnt. Flat tire right before music lesson. Got excellent. Took kittens for run. Skinny chased them. Physics & letters tonight.
1926 - Friday. Stayed at home and raked leaves.
1927 - Saturday. Went to town and had my glasses which were broken, fixed for the first time. Went to Earl's. Pirates lost Boo Hoo.
1928 - Monday. Hockey. Am on team II. "Us" I am "Wing"
1929 - Tuesday. Hockey! Mailed package to John. Poor dear! Little Funny Face died!! Oh! I cried and cried. The poor baby pussy of mine who loved me too!!!
1930 - Wednesday. Girl Reserve meeting an nite. Alrite. Stayed till five in lab doing Physics. I certainly hope I pass it! (I mean the experiment) Rained - tire fixed, etc.
1926 - Saturday. Worked in morning. Mary Wells came over in afternoon.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and M.E. Church to see the Masons an Knight Templers.
1928 - Tuesday. Had music lesson. Washed hair. Worked Alg with Petie.
1929 - Wednesday (tee hee) It's only (?) Well, her I really am!! Had a Coamy. I buried poor little Funny Face. The Last of the Precious Litter.
1930 - Thursday. Hooray! I passed all my lab experiments! I hope I'll past exam demain. I got 93 in French test. Rode & took Buddy for his in aft. and went to dentist. Fooled tonite.
1926 - Went to Sunday School. Went up to Earles.
1927 - Monday. Had music lesson. Went to see Miss Wood. Won Bridge Prize.
1928 - Wednesday. Fixed playhouse, aquarium, raked leaves with Mary Wells and Peggy Townsend.
1929 - Thursday. Hockey practice. Played almost all time. Had my hair set. Sent John's package.
1930 - Friday. Had Tiger & 2 starving kittys killed. She has had about 40! Sad! Physics test (6 weeks) Went to Beaver. Bumped into truck. It was its fault. Mother mad as hops! I don't see why!
1926 - Monday. Went swimming.
1927 - Played tennis with V. Jones.. Beat her 6-3, 6-2. Had dinner at Peggy Townsends.
1928 - Thursday. Us's beat GOP's and tied Orioles. Ray!! Us!! We want a goal!!!!
1929 - Friday. School dance in aft. Progressive dinner tonite. Pecks of fun. Specially at Pinx's.
1930 - Saturday. Up at 9:30. Fixed cat coop. Mrs. Harbison's at 11:00 with Sally. Peachy dinner. Rode to town with Smarts. Up to Earle's. Home at 10:00 & Jenesuivouchie (de bonne huere)
1926 - Tuesday. Played football with Mike Morgan.
1927 - Wednesday. Choir practise.
1928 - Friday. Went to Doctor C. Had dead tissue take from throat. I feel punk.
1929 - Saturday. Worked hard. Earl was here. Fooled around.
1930 - Sunday. Went to S.S. with Sally. Ride in aft. with Emericks. Woods lovely. Home at five. Finished "The Virginian." It was gude. Bed early.
1926 - Wednesday. Went to choir practise. She wasn't there so played football with Mike. Mother came home!!
1927 - Thursday. Stayed at home.
1928 - Saturday. Went up town. Had fun. Went to show. Came home. Went to Emericks. Saw Margaret.
1929 - Sunday. Earle was here. Ma came home. Surprised me!!! Went to S.S. Fine teacher, Mrs. Harbison!!!
1930 - Monday. Fun in Physics. Walked to skoole today. In aft. took Buddy for run & ride. Fooled with Skinnywinks & Katy. Her cute darling. Washed Buddy p.m.
1926 - Thursday. Went up home to Earles.
1927 - Friday. We played Arnold here. Tied 0-0. Rotten at plays.
1928 - Sunday. Went to S.S. Went up home. They had a dedication service.
1929 - Monday. Got excellent in Music. I've had a lot now.
1930 - Tuesday. Excellent in music. Walked to skoole. D.Baird & I finished 9 & 10 experiments. We're on 11. Sundaes with Sally & Jane M. Played with Bud & Amos. Letters & you tonite, Diary.
1926 - Friday. Dammuddy went home. sadness!! Hope she will come again pretty soon.
1927 - Saturday. Earl came down also P.
1928 - Monday. Hockey again. We "Us's" lost to G.O.P's but tied the Orioles.
1929 - Tuesday. GOP's played Orioles. Beat them, but it doesn't count.
1930 - Wednesday. G.R. read a play. Sally treated us afterwards. Came home & fooled around. Bed late tonite.
1926 - Saturday. Went up to Earles. He went to Clarion.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church. Rally Day. Took Earl and P. home.
1928 - Tuesday. Had music lesson. Washed hair. Did algebra with F.E. and P.T.
1929 - Wednesday. Mary Wells was naughty in school and Witty scolded her!
1930 - Thursday. Mildred & family came to see us tonite. We played cyards, etc. Had fun. Donald & I finished Exp 11 & started 12 today.
1926 - Sunday. Went to Sunday School and church. Lolled around.
1927 - Monday. Music lesson. Hockey. Watched football game.
1928 - Wednesday. We had Coamy. We decided not to have dues. Boo Hoo!
1929 - Thursday. Hockey! US's beat Orioles 4-2 but lost to GOP's 4-3.
1930 - Friday. Sewickley lost football game to Bellevue. Went to town R.H, Earley, Eleanore & I saw Joe E. Brown in "Maybe It's Love."
1926 - Monday. Went swimming.
1927 - Tuesday. Went to P.T.'s for supper. Shooie was there. Played bridge. Had pecks of fun. Rained.
1928 - Thursday. "Us" lost to GOP's but tied the Orioles. Hooray!!!!
1929 - Friday. Came home and fooled with M.W. We are so lazy!
1930 - Saturday. Drove to town today at noon. Got hat, candy etc. I got home about 4:30. Studied tonite etc.
1926 - Tuesday Started to go swimming.
1927 - Wednesday. Went to choir practice. Snowed.
1928 - Friday. Went to Doctor Cheesman's. He cut my throat again. This is last time.
1929 - Saturday. Got a new coat. It's quite hot. Got favors for my Halloween party.
1930 - Sunday. Went to S.S. with S.S. (Sally Smart) Walked home mit her part way. Church at nite. A. Hat & I went.
1926 - Wednesday. Went to choir practice.
1927 - Thursday. Went up street a couple of times. Rained.
1928 - Saturday. Saw Al Jolson in "The Singing Fool." It sure was good. It was very sad and I cried.
1929 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church and church at night. Had a big fight with Effie. M.W. & I.
1930 - Monday. No gym today. After school program committee meeting of G.R. I actually knew my physics lesson today. Jane Mitchell & I watched S.A. play hockey.
1926 - Thursday. Went up to Earls.
1927 - Friday. We played Shadyside. Beat them 33-0.
1928 - Sunday. Went to S.S. Church and again at night. Peggy and Winnie Matthews came over.
1929 - Monday Got excellent in music. Came home and fooled.
1930 - Tuesday. Finished Exp 12 in lab. Music lesson. Peachy ice cream for dinner. Snowed today. First snow of the season.
1926 - Friday. Alice Crutchfield came over.
1927 - Saturday. Went up to Earls.
1928 - M[ond]ay. "Us" wo[n a] game 4-0 and lost a [gam]e 1-0 to GOP's and Orioles [re]spectively . I made 2 goals.
1929 - T[ues]day. We had basketball on account of rain. First of the season. I'm a forward again.
1930 - Wednesday. Skinnywinks hurt. Paralyzed, but may be saved. Oh! I hope so! Wrote 3 letters tonite. Don't owe a soul. Miss Hubbell kept us in! Talking in Activity Period !!!!!
1926 - Saturday. Went to Mary Well's. We cooked outside.
1927 - Sunday. Stayed home.
1928 - Tuesday. Had music lesson. Washed hair.
1929 - Wednesday. Basketball from 4-5. "Witty" mad M.W. sit way over. Tee hee.
1930 - Thursday. Lab in Physics. We had a test in Public Speaking. I hope I passed it. Chapel not so hot this week.
1926 - Sunday. Went up to Earles. Rained.
1927 - Monday. Music lesson and hockey.
1928 - Wednesday. We had meeting at Peggy Townsends. We played in attic. Work coming on fine over at the school.
1929 - Thursday. First snow of the season! Rainy. Susan made debut. We had basketball. Took shower.
1930 - Friday. Game with Ambridge 18-0. I came home & lazied around instead. I have sore throat. There's an epidemic at school.
1926 - Monday. Went swimming. It snowed hard.
1927 - Tuesday. Pay tennis. Lawrence Dunham beat me 6-1 6-2.
1928 - Thursday. Went to hockey. We had lots of fun.
1929 - Friday. Had C.M. M.W., A.H. and I went to town at nite. Saw J. Gilbert in "His Glorious Night" at Penn.

1930 - Saturday. T Hey had to kill Amosy! Poor Skinnywinks was paralyzed!!!! Boohoo. I loved him! Went to Stanly. Saw Ann Harding in "A Girl of the Golden West." It was peachy. Ed Lawry was on the stage. good!
1926 - Tuesday. Frances Emery came over. We had a good time.
1927 - Wednesday. Choir practise.
1928 - Friday. Played basketball. We had lots of fun.
1929 - Saturday. Had hair washed & set. Slept late.
1930 - Sunday. Stayed in bed all day today. I feel better tonite, but my throat hurts terribly. Aunt Hat went to town.
1926 - Wednesday. I gave Aunt Hat a sweater. I gave her a good spanking.
1927 - Thursday. Went to Football game. Arnold. We tied 0-0. Gave A.H. 6 pair silk hose. Do do do do-do do.
1928 - Saturday. 39. Gave Aunt Hat slippers and silk hose - O-me-o my.
1929 - Sunday. 40!! Went to town. Gave Aunt Hat a pair of shoes and a hanky. Earl was confirmed.
1930 - Monday. 41 getting old!! Feel punk. Went to doctors. Went to Smiths. Came home at ten. Am very tired now! Got excused from Physics!
1926 - Thursday. I went to Rody McCabes party.
1927 - Friday. Party. First Formers by Civics Club. To welcome them.
1928 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church and Church at night.
1929 - Monday. Music lesson. Got excellent. 9 in a row. Mr. Moore is better.
1930 - Tuesday. Lab again. Donald & I stayed a while & finished working big long glass tube hickey. Came home & went to bed.
1926 - Friday. I went to Betty Wheats. Sewickley Academy beat Arnold.
1927 - Saturday. Frannee was here for lunch. M.W. came over. Baked and played football. Bonfire at night.
1928 - Monday. Hockey. GOP's beat 2. We won 1 and lost 1 and are gaining.
1929 - Tuesday. Basketball. No hockey on account of rain.
1930 - Wednesday. Test in Physics. Awful hearing about wreck from 4 to 5. I'll never forget that awful red-headed man. All the rest were nice. Letters now!
1926 - Saturday. I went to Franee Emery's for supper and then went raiding.
1927 - Sunday. Went tot S.S. and Church also at night. Went to Shooies but he wasn't home.
1928 - Tuesday. Music lesson. I got Excellent. Tsk tsk. Washed my hair. Aunt Hat is sick Boo Hoo.
1929 - Wednesday. Had practice basketball with only 2 scrimmages.
1930 - Thursday. Lab today. I stayed in with Donald for a while. Public Speaking today. Have horrible old Prison Reform for next week.
1926 - Sunday. Went up to Earles.
1927 - Monday. Hallowe'en. Had loads of fun. F.E.'s and then to B.W.s.
1928 - Wednesday. Hallowe'en! We had pecks of fun. We raided A.C., F.E., M.W.V.P., and P.T. and I did it all.
1929 - Thursday. Had basketball again because of rain!
1930 - Friday. Didn't raid Boohoo! Football game with Avalon. S.H.S. made first touchdown of season! But we lost 13-6. No fight to them. Went to parade.

formalpara.title: MEMORANDA
formalpara.para:
Ye US's War Cry!!!!!
Fight, team, fight
Fight, team, fight
Fight, team, fight
Soc 'em, Bust 'em,
That's the custom
Fight, team, fight
WE want a goal
We WANT a goal
We want A goal
We want a GOAL
WE WANT A GOAL Rah Rah Rah

listitem.para: 1926 - Monday. Went swimming as usual.
1927 - Tuesday. Played hockey. Had fun.
1928 - Thursday. G.O.Ps beat Us. We beat Orioles Score now is G.O.Ps 19, Us 13, Orioles 10. BooHoo!!!
1929 - Friday. Played "Michigan" with Franny and Mary Wells. I won for once!
1930 - Saturday. Drove to town for a cat, but didn't get it. Fun with new little puppy at Smith's. Drove home, etc.
1926 - Tuesday. I raked leaves and worked. John got sick. It was cold.
1927 - Wednesday. Mary Wells and Peggy T. came over. We played cards.
1928 - Friday. Game at Shadyside. The dang neckriders won 21-6 hurting and knocking out 2 good boys on our team.
1929 - Saturday. Went to Mrs. Harbison's. Made surgical dressings and other articles. Had a fine time & lunch.
1930 - Sunday. Went to S.S. with Sally. Had hair washed. I set it. Studied Physics. Went for a ride with the Emericks. Lovely country road!
1926 - Wednesday. No choir practise. I played around.
1927 - Thursday. Stayed home. Cleaned aquarium. It snowed. First time.
1928 - Saturday. I have a cold. Aunt Hat is in bed. What a rotten day!!!
1929 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and church. Stayed home. Did English
1930 - Monday. More fun in Physics. I thought I'd die! Rode to town & saw Amos 'n Andy in "Check & Double Check." It was good.
1926 - Thursday. Did a lot of walking around.
1927 - Friday. Went to Franees. Then to Shoe-Makers. Had loads of fun. Cold.
1928 - Sunday. Went to S.S. Went to Franee's. Aunt Hat is still in bed. I am better. Went to M.Wells.
1929 - Monday. Got excellent in music. Had hair washed.
1930 - Tuesday. Physics lab. Punk time. Went to town to church super. Yummy eats. Fooled around & studied some tonite. Tired now! Have to teach French demain.
1926 - Friday. Sewickley Academy beat Arnold 13-7. Hooray for our team!!!!!!!Hooray!!!!!!!
1927 - Saturday. Went to Earls. Got new dress leather coat and hat. Christmas present.
1928 - Monday. G.O.Ps beat Us 3-2 but we beat Orioles 6-4. Rah!! Rah!! Peggy is sick. Everybody has colds.
1929 - Tuesday. Ye Us's lost 4-1 both games. Almost everyone is sick.
1930 - Wednesday. Stayed at school till 5 p.m. Walked home. Didn't go to R. because Sally & Jane couldn't. Stayed home & played cards with Aunt Hat.
1926 - Saturday. Went up to Earls for all day.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church. Lolled around went to Choir. Had hair washed.
1928 - Tuesday. Just as I ordinarily do. I refer to October 23, 1928. Ho hum!! I'm tired. Goodnight!!
1929 - Wednesday. Went to town. Grace Church had a church supper. It was yummy.
1930 - Thursday. Lab today. Donald & I are two ahead. Came home & monkeyed. Ham was good & I'm thirsty now! Had hair washed. Mr. Conneely here!
1926 - Sunday. Went up to Earles.
1927 - Monday. Music lessons and hockey.
1928 - Wednesday. In Public Speaking, we had to make speeches. I always get scared, darn it!!
1929 - Thursday. Poor Us's lost both games again today. However, we fought even harder, scores being 1-0 both games.
1930 - Friday. Yea Us's!! They won hockey tournament! Beat Gops & Orioles 2-1. Orioles beat Gops 4-1!! Am I proud of my old team? Well, I guess!!! How I love 'em!
1926 - Monday. Went swimming.
1927 - Tuesday. No hockey. Played around.
1928 - Monday. Nov. 12. Frannee Mary Wells and I finished the roof and stove. We mad a fire. We saw the parade. It was good.
1929 - Friday. Club meeting. Went to Crutchy's tonight. We had a fine time.
1930 - Saturday. Yea Pitt!! First big football game I've seen. Earl, too. Pitt beat Tech 7-6. Close call. Hickey at Mrs. Harbison's. Supper at Smiths. Hungry as a bear.
1926 - Tuesday. Alice Crutchfield came over. I got sick.
1927 - Wednesday. Played with girls.
1928 - Friday. Basketball. We had fun. We had old dumb writing. Yuk! with it!!!
1929 - Saturday. Went to Penn. Saw "Marianne." Went to Mrs. Smiths.
1930 - Sunday. Went to S.S. & Church & church at nite. At last I did what was right. Mrs. Harbison surely caters to Grace, Ottie & Helen!
1926 - Wednesday. Stayed in bed all day. I have tonsilitis.
1927 - Thursday. Watched girls art class. Got myself a "Dark Cow."
1928 - Saturday. This is a terrible day. Frannee and fixed the playhouse roof though.
1929 - Sunday. Went to all. F.A. and M.W came over etc.
1930 - Monday. Came home, after being at Sally's. Had piles of lessons. Got to bet at 10: Boy! am I tired? Was invited to Lib Crampton's, but couldn't go!
1926 - Thursday. Armistice Day. I am still in bed. I am a lot better. My temp. is normal.
1927 - Friday. No school. Went up to Earle's. Saw Warner Bros. and Becky at Loews Penn.
1928 - Sunday. 10 years since war ended. M.W. and I went down to Frannee's. Crutchy came too.
1929 - Monday. Dumb bunny! I went to town. Armistice Day. Went to grand. too!! I even remember a year back!!
1930 - Tuesday. Watta day?! Got up at 8:30. R.H., Sally and I drove to town. Saw G. Arlise in "Old English." Had lunch at Reymers. Then = Laughter!! N. Carroll at Fulton. Dinner at Smiths.
1926 - Friday. Still in bed but better. Eli killed by Fritz and Crap and Spotty.
1927 - Saturday. Played with the girls. Western Reserve beat S.A. 6-0 but were 10 lbs to a man too heavy for us.
1928 - Thursday., Nov. 8. The "Us" team was terrible today. We lost 2 games.
1929 - Tuesday. Us's tied Gops and lost to Orioles. Boohoo!
1930 - Wednesday. School again! Recognition Service at G.R. Rody was there. Had supper at 5:00 p.m. Am very lazy right now!
1926 - Saturday. Still in bed dawgonnit!! I got a couple of presents.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church and took Red Cross in afternoon. and choir practice.
1928 - Tuesday. Got excellent in music lesson. I learned how to pleat my bloomers.
1929 - Wednesday. Warked and Dayed & Theogony! I don't know what I did!
1930 - Thursday. I'm tired! Finished letter to Pinx. Am way back in letters! O we 5! Lab today. Got mercury all over myself! More fun, took goods for Hospital.
1926 - Sunday. My temp is normal. Hooray I get up tomorrow. Hooray.
1927 - Monday. Played hockey and took a music lesson.
1928 - Wednesday. We tried out for a play in "Public Speaking," called "Eether or Eyther" It is very funny. Mothers beat daughters 8-4. I played as a mother once. It was fun.
1929 - Thursday. Hockey. Us's lost both!
1930 - Friday. S.H.S. Football team is rotten! Haven't won a game yet! Cory licked the hides of our team 37-0 but referee was all for Cory!!!!!!!
1926 - Monday. Got up. Hooray!! I'm well again.
1927 - Tuesday. Played hockey. Game will be a week from today with Ellis.
1928 - Thursday. Effie, Petie and I made a fire on the new stove. We watched the little hockey stars.
1929 - Friday. We had a C.M. on Coamy. I had refreshments.
1930 - Saturday. Up at 8. Dentist at 9. Music lesson at 10. Party at Jane Mitchells at 2:30. Town at 5::30. Back home at 10:40. Am very tired now!
1926 - Tuesday. Went to school at last. Virginia McCabe came over.
1927 - Wednesday. Played hockey. Third day this week.
1928 - Friday. Had writing lesson again. Whew!! They're fooey!!!
1929 - Saturday. Went to town. Had lots of fun.
1930 - Sunday. S.S. & Church. Washed Buddy. Daddy called a couple of times. Welfare Fund, got $176.18 +. Study & letters at nite! Just like last year!
1926 - Wednesday. Went to Shady-side - Sewickley Football game. We lost 14-0 But it was a very good game
1927 - Thursday. Stayed at home. Made a crazy speech for "Civics Club."
1928 - Saturday. Saw "Uncle Tom's Cabin." It was peachy.
1929 - Sunday. Solicited for W.F. (Welfare Fund) on this rainy day. Later forund out all about it.
1930 - Monday. Had hair washed & fooled around. I'm writing this at a late date & am very much ashamed!
1926 - Thursday. Stayed at home for a change.
1927 - Friday. Played hockey. Am playing "Wing" now. Grandma crushed her hand.
1928 - Sunday Played with Mary Wells. Looked at place for new school.
1929 - Monday. Got "excellent" in music. Effie takes now, too!
1930 - Tuesday. Music lesson. I read in library till time. Did my Physics.
1926 - Went to Peggy Leiper's. Read books.
1927 - Saturday. Went up town to get a baret and then to Earles.
1928 - Monday. Basketball. Afterwards, F.E. and I got an eskimoe pie.
1929 - Tuesday. This was the day that M.W. came over and fooled. We didn't to b.b.
1930 - Wednesday. Went to town in aft. with a -H. we saw "Abraham Lincoln." Very sad!
1926 - Saturday. Went up to Earles.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church, and down to Shooies in the afternoon.
1928 - Tuesday. Went up home after my music lesson. It's Grandma and Grandpa's anniversary.
1929 - Wednesday. Came home and fixed up a lot of things.
1930 - Thursday. Physics lab, also geometry test. I hope I passed it.
1926 - Sunday. Went to S.S. Bulldogs on Tiger's 1 yard line. Score 6-0 Bulldogs favor. Went to Earles.
1927 - Monday. Hockey practice.
1928 - Wednesday. I am Mr. Turlington, Jr. in the play called "Eether or Eyther." It's very funny.
1929 - Thursday. (Mary W. came over. I didn't play) Oh yes I did! We had b.b. practice and I went to church luncheon.
1930 - Game with Ben Avon. Lost 14-0. I didn't see it. I went to town to Mrs. Smith's Anniversary.
1926 - Monday. Crutchy came over we made fudge.
1927 - Tuesday. Hooray! We beat Ellis 3-0. But Boo hoo I didn't get to play as I was a sub.
1928 - Thursday. Washed hair and cleaned up. Franee's Party is tomorrow.
1929 - Friday. Gym class! I love it! I'm tallest in school! Afterwards basketball. First Public Speaking Class!
1930 - Saturday. Went to town. Saw Harold Lloyd in "Feet First." Punk.
1926 - Tuesday. Found out Mrs. Atwell died. Sad, sad, sad.
1927 - Wednesday. Half day. Went up to Earles.
1928 - Friday. Went to basketball and played the whole time. I'm tired now. Went to Franee's Party. It was a fish party. Everybody got 2 fish in a bowl. It was lovely.
1929 - Saturday. Went to town. Did lots of shopping etc.
1930 - Sunday. S.S. & church at night. Fooled around in afternoon.
1926 - Wednesday. Hooray! Half day at school!!!!
1927 - Thanksgiving. Ate a lot of turkey. Went to Earles. ate chicken.
1928 - Saturday. Went up home. We saw Abie's Irish Rose," at the Grand. It was very good.
1929 - Sunday. Went and saw Mrs. Townsend after Effie, A.H. and I looked over new hospital.
1930 - Monday. Went arount to Walkers with Sally. Eskies & then to her house. Then home.
1926 - Thursday. Thanksgiving. Went up to Earls. Granpa went to Hospital.
1927 - Friday. Worked. Peggy T and I made a gig.
1928 - Sunday. It snowed real hard. Kids are even sledriding. A whole bunch of girls came over.
1929 - Monday. Had "excellent" in music! Thirteenth one I've had in a row. Hope it's not unlucky!
1930 - Tuesday. Basketball practice. I hope I can make the Junior team. Only four out for practice.
1926 - Friday. Granpa getting tired of hospital. Didn't do much.
1927 - Saturday. Worked on gig. Stayed at P.T.'s for lunch. Then to Earles.
1928 - Monday. Basketball Practice. Snow is still on the ground. Heck!! No game tomorrow.
1929 - Tuesday. Hockey! Us's won 1 while I was at hairdressers 2-0 and lost one while I was there 3-1!!
1930 - Wednesday. Got out of school at 1:40 p.m. Went to Aunt Mame's Funeral. First I've been to. Came home and read etc. Sad!
1926 - Saturday. Went to Earls. Went sledriding.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church. Lolled around.
1928 - Tuesday. Had music lesson early. Hooray!! We got new Latin Books. Tsk, tsk.
1929 - Wednesday. Excused school at 12:00. Got to Carlisle at about 8:00. Grand trip!
1930 - Thursday. Oy! Watta day! Dined here at one. Trolleys to Mildred's. Ate there at four. Trolly to Mrs. Smiths. Diner there at seven. Trolly to train. Only 5 of them.
1926 - Sunday. Went to Earls. Bulldogs ahead of Tigers 12-0. Hooray.
1927 - Monday. Had music lesson. Went to see gig.
1928 - Wednesday. Cooked lunch out. (Coamy.) Miss Hutchins came too. We went to town in P.T.'s car to see movie at Penn.
1929 - Thursday. Had a big turkey dinner at Argonne. Jean Johnston & family & friend. Saw "Salute." Good!
1930 - Friday. Music lesson. Went to town in aft. Saw Eddie Quillan in "Big Money" Party at F.A.H. at nite. Almost won booby. Hard time mit Ford.
1926 - Monday. Grandpa as operated on. Got coal grate.
1927 - Tuesday. Game with mothers. We won 3-1. I played today.
1928 - Thursday. Ate turkey down here and chicken up home. I stuffed myself terribly.
1929 - Friday. Went to see Junior Sheaffer. He has grown late. He's cute.
1930 - Saturday. Got up at 9:30. Went to town on 11:32. Shopped for Xmas. Saw "Hell's Angels" at Penn. Punk!
1926 - Tuesday. On Honor Roll. It rained. Granpa has an Ether cough.
1927 - Wednesday. Came home. Mended.
1928 - Friday. John got his tuxedo!!! His first one!!! I lolled around today!!!!
1929 - Friday. Meant to be Saturday here! Pardon my faulty error here diary! I know you'll forgive me!
1930 - Sunday. S.S. Letters - Read. Rainy day! Rained & so no church tonite. Heard Floyd Gibbons at 9:30 & then to bed!

blockquote.para: Oh Orioles you have pep and go
Boom Boom and a little bit more
You think that you can lay Us low
Boom Boom and a little bit more
But when it comes to hockey
or any old game at all
You'll get all that's coming to you,
Boom Boom and a little bit, Boom and a little bit
Boom Boom and a little bit more

listitem.para: 1929 - Saturday (Nov. 30) Went to Ford Show and also saw William Haines in "Speedway." Talked at Dammuddy's real late.
1926 - Wednesday. No choir practice. Played around
1927 - Thursday. Had hair washed.
1928 - Saturday. Pan and I bot junk for clubhouse. We had Progressive dinner!!! Oh! What fun!!! I had the desert!! Yum!!
1929 - Sunday. Had lovely day for ride home! Just think! It is all over! Boohoo. Had fine time on train.
1930 - Monday. Walked four ways to skoole. Came home - bot candy Fooled around. Wally was here but most of the candy is now gone.
1926 - Thursday. Came home and read. Miss Ellis' school beat S.A. 3-0.
1927 - Friday. Played around.
1928 - Sunday. The club came over. We made a fire in clubhouse.
1929 - Monday. Ugh! School is such a bore again. Got "excellent" in music! Only practiced 2 days as I was away!
1930 - Tuesday. Y.R. Cabinet meeting & music lesson. Came home & monkeyed. Walked all day today.
1926 - Friday. Came home and worked.
1927 - Saturday. Went up to Earles. Did all my Christmas shopping. Saw Santa Claus and reindeer - Tee hee.
1928 - Monday. Franny, Aunt Hat and I went to town. We did our Xmas shopping. No school for us!!!
1929 - Tuesday. Basketball practice. Oh my, but I got hot!
1930 - Wednesday. Went to hospital tonite for G.R. & made dressings. Saw the darlingest new-born picaninny. Also cute others.
1926 - Saturday. Went up to Earls. Had a good time.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church. Played with girls.
1928 - Tuesday. Yea!! S.A. beat Simonson's 31-20 Rah!Rah! I got to play also Yeah !!!!!! Don't faint.
1929 - Wednesday. M.W. A.L. and I went to town. Saw "Disraeli," George Arliss was in it. Prime Minister of Eng. etc.
1930 - Thursday. Donald & I stayed in till 4:45 for lab & are only 2 exps behind now! Whew! It's awful.
1926 - Sunday. Snowed real hard. Got up at 10:30. Went to Earls. Visited Grandpa.
1927 - Monday. Basketball. We had fun.
1928 - Wednesday. Went to practise for pageant, but it was over.
1929 - Thursday. Fell down steps. Hurt ankle; so could not play basketball. Have it strapped.
1930 - Friday. Gym. Fun in it. Came home & read. Senior dance tonite. Fair time. No eats at all! Boohoo (for me!) Don Baird, J Fullman & D. McConnell danced. Took Sally.
1926 - Monday. Went sledriding.
1927 - Tuesday. Played with girls.
1928 - Thursday. I was the "Wicket Magician" in a tableau. I was supposed to be dead. I was encored. (tee hee)
1929 - Friday. Hooray! No school!! Something wrong with furnace!! Washed hair. M.W. Effie & I played cards in a.m.
1930 - Saturday. Went to town on 11:32 Finished most of my Xmas shopping. Lunch at Smiths. Home on 5:08 & in taxi mit M.Morrison & Miss Hubbell. O deah!
1926 - Tuesday. Went to Basketball.
1927 - Wednesday. Played basketball.
1928 - Friday. Came home and went to bed. My temp is 102. I have the Grippe.
1929 - Saturday. Lovely time at Mrs. Harbison's. Good eats, too. Yummy cake! Town in aft. with Helen Moore. Effie ad to butt in on us, you might know. She is getting so uppish.
1930 - Sunday. Went to S.S. but not to church. Wally & Joe here in aft. Paper fight! Church at nite. Bill was here for a while.
1926 - Wednesday. Went to choir practice.
1927 - Thursday. Washed hair.
1928 - Saturday. Dagonnit! I missed Mary Wells's party, and I wanted very much to go.
1929 - Sunday. Went to Mary Wells' in aft. S.S. in morning, also washed Buddy. Church at night which was good.
1930 - Monday. M. teased me because I came home in taxi mit Miss Hubbell. Imagine, Diary, he called me "teacher's pet." I'm negusted(?).
1926 - Thursday. Practiced basketball at home.
1927 - Friday. Football - Hockey Dance. Only got a letter. Other kids got sweatshirts.
1928 - Sunday. My temp. went from 102 - 98.4. Hurray!!!
1929 - Monday. Barely got an excellent today, Diary. I've had 15 now; so she owes me another piece.
1930 - Tuesday - got excellent in music. And in lab. I just love Physics. Hope I keep on
1926 - Friday. Played basketball again.
1927 - Saturday. Went to town. Skated in afternoon.
1928 - Monday. Am still in bed. I have all todays lessons done and all but one of tomorrow's.
1929 - Tuesday. Basketball practice. I was punk. Got A on a Latin paper. Dear Dear!
1930 - Wednesday. Got up. Ate bekbets. Walked to skoole. Came hom. Went. Came home. Ate dinner. Studied. Fooled. G. Reserves. Bed!!!
1926 - Saturday. Went to town. Did all Christmas shopping.
1927 - Sunday. Went to Church. Played with girls.
1928 - Tuesday. Am in bed today too. I feel all right, but yew hav 2 b carefull of the fluuuuuuu.
1929 - Wednesday. Came home. Worked hair etc.
1930 - Thursday. Physics lab. Donald & I are way behind. Boohoo! Good chapel today. Michael spoke.
1926 - Sunday. Went to S.S. Janes mother died. Went to see Grandpa.
1927 - Monday. Went for a ride in gig.
1928 - Wednesday. Got up today. I feel all right. I wish I could go to skool, but I can't.
1929 - Thursday. Basketball practice. Had lots of fun. Ma came and watched. I nearly broke glasses.
1930 - Friday. Last miss in this diary. This is Jan. 1931. First time I've written it. Had a test in Physics. Got 88.
1926 - Monday. Went swimming again. Hooray!
1927 - Tuesday. Washed hair.
1928 - Thursday. Rested a lot. I couldn't go to school because of this awful fog. It's very foullll.
1929 - Friday. Friday the thirteenth. Very unlucky for me!? Oh my no! I've forgotten what I did much today! (This is Jan. 5, 1930)
1930 - Saturday. Went to town & did piles of shopping. Saw movie & little kid show at Penn. Awfully good. Ted Claire, M. of C.
1926 - Tuesday. Frances and Hippy came over. We played football.
1927 - Wednesday. Played basketball.
1928 - Friday. I fooled around this whole day. I can't go out on account of the fog.
1929 - Saturday. Worked at Mrs. Harbison's. We have most everything for the family of Macnick's now. I crocheted 2 (?)
1930 - Sunday. Led in Sunday School. Sally said prayer. Church at nite. Read & fooled in aft.
1926 - Wednesday. Went to choir practice.
1927 - Thursday. Rode in gig.
1928 - Saturday. The fog is lifting tonight. It certainly has been awful for the last few days.
1929 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and church and also at night. Played around.
1930 - Monday. Had a music lesson. She didn't mark it. BoohooBoohooBoo!
1926 - Thursday. Went to Crutchy's and made fudge.
1927 - Friday. Unknown to the honorable writer. I have forgotten.
1928 - Sunday. John got his Ford car today because some boys knew about it. It sure is beautiful.
1929 - Monday. Got a "very good" Boohoo! I just couldn't play "Narcissus." I wasn't so well either. I had a headache but she didn't care.
1930 - Tuesday. Sewickley lost to Coraopolis. Both teams did. Fooled around in lab.
1926 - Friday. Last day of school. Went to town.
1927 - Saturday. Did some Christmas shopping. Went to Earls.
1928 - Monday. At last!! I got to go to the village and buy things for Aunt Hat's stocking.
1929 - Tuesday. Basketball practice. Had fun.
1930 - Wednesday. I'm all excited. John arrives demain. Skated with Sally & Jane tonite. My ankles are tired now.
1926 - Saturday. Did Christmas shopping. Went to see Grandpa.
1927 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and Church. Played with kids in aft.
1928 - Tuesday. Went to town. Got stuff for Aunt Hat's stocking. Went over home.
1929 - Wednesday. I'm so excited! Peggy home tomorrow and John on Fri. Oh!Oh! I washed Buddy and did odd jobs.
1930 - Thursday. Hooray. John arrived. Came for us at noon. S. & I had to wait about five min. Um Um. J. Keeney came too!!!!!!
1926 - Sunday. 14 -Went to S.S. in morning. Went to see Grandpa in afternoon
1927 - Monday. 15 - John had Bun for Supper. Gave him a sweater.
1928 - Wednesday. 16 -John drove around in his car. I gave him his license plates and half on a watch.
1929 - Thursday. 17 - John isn't home. However, I gave him skates! Peggy was here at noon! I almost cried. I was so happy HOORAY!!
1930 - Friday. 18 - Gave John underwear. He's ancient now. 18?! Hard to believe! g'nite!
1926 - Monday. Went shopping. Visited grandpa. Washed clothes.
1927 - Tuesday. Peggy and Frannee came over. We had fun.
1928 - Thursday. Mary Wells and Peggy came over. We went over to the school. The building is coming along fine.
1929 - Friday. Play etc. Last day of school! John came home! I'm so excited. We had his birthday dinner tonight.
1930 - Saturday. Town in a.m. Betty Dunsford's tea in aft. Skated at nite.
1926 - Tuesday. Went to see him today again. He is coming home soon. Ironed clothes.
1927 - Wednesday. Went down to Franees.
1928 - Friday. Mary Wells and Peggy came over. We had exciting fire in clubhouse. We extinguished it, though. It's cold.
1929 - Saturday. Went to town in Ford! Lots of fun. Gog stuff for A.H's stocking.
1930 - Sunday Slept late. S.S. in aft. We had to carry candles. Oh! Were we hot? We didn't (Effie, M.W. & I) Skated Pinx tonite.
1926 - Wednesday. Went ice skating but they wouldn't work.
1927 - Thursday. Played with Frannee and Peggy T.
1928 - Saturday. Went up home. Got stuff for stockings to help Santa out.
1929 - Sunday. Went to church in aft. Saw pageant. It was fine. F.E. and Helen Moore, the Crutchfields etc. were in it.
1930 - Monday. Went to Ruth's tonite & played Michigan & Pokeno. Loads of fun. Crutchy, Franny, Ruth, M. Stones & I went.
1926 - Thursday. Trimmed Earles tree. Went to see Grandpa.
1927 - Friday. Went to Earls. Trimmed tree.
1928 - Sunday. It's still foggy around here and the flu epidemic is still pretty bad. They say the bad flu is coming.
1929 - Monday. No school. Went to town and finished last Xmas shopping.
1930 - Tuesday. Hooray! School is over. Was a dumb angel in Glee Club. Went to Alumni Pana with Stanley Song. Finest yet. Oodles of fun. All dances danced(?)
1926 - Friday. Grandpa came home. Trimmed tree.
1927 - Saturday. Trimmed tree. Played around.
1928 - Monday. We trimmed tree and waited for carols at 11:00 p.m. I was disappointed in them.
1929 - Betty Wheat's dance. It was the worst one I've ever been to. She didn't even introduce us to anyone. Just danced(?) with David N(?) all night.
1930 - Wednesday. Wrapped presents. Took them around. Fixed stockings etc. I got to bed late.
1926 - Saturday (Christmas) Went to Aunt Mames for dinner. Then we went to Earls alone.
1927 - Sunday. Had a turkey dinner. Got lots of presents.
1928 - Tuesday. Had lovely stocking and gifts. Went to Aunt Mame's and then up home. Got a lovely case!! Hooray!!
1929 - Wednesday. Got a grafonola. It's peachy! Mom gave it to me!! Got lots of other nice resents. Dinner at Aunt Betty's. Supper, Dinner at Smith's.
1930 - Thursday. Had wunerful Xmas. Drove to town & back. Boo hoo! Last Xmas in this book?! Writing with new pen.
1926 - Sunday. Got up at 10:30. Read all day. Went to Church at night.
1927 - Monday. Went to Aunt Mames and then to Earls.
1928 - Wednesday. Played around with Mary Wells. Saw her gifts and she saw mine.
1929 - Thursday. Went to see M.W.'s presents. Had fun with mine.
1930 - Friday. Bill came. He's terribly cute. Went to town with M.W. Got prizes. Played ping pong. Had lunch & dinner at her house.
1926 - Monday. Surprize Party for Hippy. Alice C and Frannee were there. We had a good time. Washed clothes.
1927 - Tuesday. Went to Frannees and wrote Peggy T. a letter because she has Chicken Pox.
1928 - Thursday. Went to town. Got shoes and green silk undies. Went to Penn and saw Midgets.
1929 - Friday. Went to Child's dance. Had a rotten time. I hardly danced at all. Oh! I wish I could be introduced to some boys.
1930 - Saturday. Bridge luncheon at Communty Kitchen by M.W. Gave her present in aft. Sally down tonite for some fun.
1926 - Tuesday. Alice C and Hippy came down. We played cards. Went visiting tonight. Ironed clothes for fun.
1927 - Wednesday. Went ice skating with M.W. and F.E. F.E. came for lunch. We wrote Peggy T. a letter.
1928 - Friday. Had hair marcelled. Went to Curry dance. Hardly anyone I knew there.
1929 - Saturday. Dammuddy came!! Hooray! She didn't come till tonight, though, Boohoo!
1930 - Sunday. S.S. & Church. Invited 2 M.W.'s in aft. & ping pong & dinner at M.W's tonite.
1926 - Wednesday. Frannee, Margy, Hippy and I went sledriding.
1927 - Thursday. Went to Rody's bridge party. Had hair marcelled.
1928 - Saturday. Went to Griffiths' dance. I had a marvelous time. Louis favored me (Thump - thump)
1929 - Sunday. Went to S.S. and church. Not at night, though. Only four in our class today.
1930 - Monday. Got up at 11. Town & movies - Tom Sayer (Jackie Coogan) good! Doctors & home. Thank-you letters tonite.
1926 - Thursday. Went skating in morning. Went sledriding at Mary Wells' in afternoon.
1927 - Friday. Went to Nancy and Louis's bridge and dance. I won Booby Prize.
1928 - Sunday. Slept till 11:35. I went to Mary Wells' in aft. Washed graybeard in evening.
1929 - Monday. Went to Haines' dance. Didn't have such a hot time! Basketball game in a.m. Oldtimers beat us 7-14. Boohoo!
1930 - Tuesday. Crutchy's dance tonite. Had a rotten time. (Effie's car) Peggy arrived!! Slept over nior in Cleckmorrattic(?)
1926 - Friday. Last day for this end of book. BooHoo.
1927 - Saturday. Went to Mary Wells'. Played bridge. Frannee won prize.
1928 - Monday. Well Diary! I have had lots of fun writing along this line this year. M.W.V.P and F.E. came over.
1929 - Tuesday. As I write this it's 1/9/30(?), but who cares! I've written most every day in this, so there!! Went to M.W.s party and saw New Year in! Was second in bridge.
1930 - Wednesday Boo hooy! Last day in my good old diary! got a new one! Party at Franny's tonite. Peggy didn't come tonite. Happy Noo Yere!!!

formalpara.title: MEMORANDA
formalpara.para:
1926 - Oh! What a song. We now have a new one, much longer, so I can't put it in. Sewickley Academy's first Song. Miss Pence.
Sewickley Academy we love you,
Sewickley Academy our school,
We love thy spirit dear Sewickley
And honor each and ev'ry rule
Sewickley Academy we love you,
And our allegiance pledge to you
Dear Spirit you shall guide us onward,
E'er to thy glorious vision we'll be true.

listitem.para: 1926 - Resolved for 1927 - To write in diary daily. To not be a poor sport in anything.
1927 - Since I entirely broke last years first resolution, I guess I won't make it again. I hereby resolve nothing.
1928 - I resolve to write in ink in here, to not cheat, to be less stubborn and to make peace, and not to make anyone jealous, and to not get sick.
1929 - nothing.
I resolve hereby to not say nmad and lleh for a whole year!!! I also resolve to write in ink and to not get sick if possible.
1929 - I want it remembered that during three Xmas holidays I had five turkey dinners, a record so far. 2 here on Sunday. 1 at Aunt Betty's, 1 at Smith's and 1 at Townsends.

simplesect.title: MEMORANDA

formalpara.title: MEMORANDA
formalpara.para:
The initials of the following people are frequently found in this book.
P.R = Peggy Townsend
F.E. = Frances Emery
M.W. = Mary Wells VanPelt
A.C. = Alice Crutchfield.

simplesect.para: The Coamy means the meeting of the Y.O.M.C.A our secret club. The four girls mentioned above and I are in it.
I must confess Diary, that I haven't been very faithful but I put in the most important happenings of each day as I remember them. So, I hope you don't feel hurt.

formalpara.title: MEMORANDA
formalpara.para:
More initials etc.
A.H. = Aunt Hat. (chaperone)
P.G. = Pinkney Gott. (new member)
Dammuddy = my grandmother
b.b. = basketball
h = hockey
c.m. = Coamy!

simplesect.para:
June 13, 1930. Last day of dear old 199 - my number at school since the seventh grade. I'm going to the high-schoool now. I'll never forget that dear old number!
Peggy T. 167
B. Wheat 245
Franny 191
Looy 213
Pinx 186
Lib. Crampton 177
Crutchy 185
C. Davis 221
M.W. 234
D. Tallman 222
John 196
J. Culbertson 178
N. Harris 184

formalpara.title: MEMORANDA
formalpara.para:
US Song!
When the Blue & White
Meet the Green & Gray
On the hockey field today,
We’ll fight, fight with all our might,
With vigor we will play.
If we should win,
We'll cheer our team!
If you should win, we'll say,
"Congratulations, you're some players,
Every dog must have its day!"

formalpara.title: MEMORANDA
formalpara.para: Well, old diary, I've ended you and am about to start another. I was only twelve when I started this - in the seventh grade. I'm a Junior now. When I end my next one, I'll have graduated from college, I hope! Time flies, but I've had fun keeping you even if I did sometimes get 3 weeks behind. The lock to this is all flooky now, but I can still make it work. I hereby resolve for 1931 to try not to swear & to keep my new diary more faithfully.

chapter.title: Photos: 1926 - 1930
chapter.para: These photos have been copied from photo albums kept by either Gram or Nanny. I could not infer a likely date based upon the contents of the diay entries.

caption.para: ~1929 - 3 Linden Place - Sewickely Academy in background
Peggy, Violet McCabe, Me and Mrs. Griffiths - 1929
